name: Complete Hydrating Air Dry Hair Styling Cream
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:A frizz-fighting soft styling cream for buildable, touchable hold that lets your natural texture shine..Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Concerns:- Curl Enhancing.Key Benefits:- Softly styles, moisturizes, and smooths frizz.Highlighted Ingredients:- Squalane and Hemi-squalane: Superior to silicone, they improve hair health and strength immediately and over time..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Powered by intensely moisturizing and smoothing hemi-squalane, softening and shine-boosting moringa seed oil, and chia seed extract for soft hold, this cream beautifully defines your style. The aluminum tube is infinitely recyclable, the cap is made with 95 percent-PCR plastic, and the FSC-certified carton and insert are printed with soy-based inks..Fragrance Description:Sparkling grapefruit and tangerine combine with white florals, soft violet, and sweet honey notes..Clinical Results:In a controlled hair-swatch study, after 1 use:
ingredients: -Chia Seed Extract: Naturally derived texture enhancers add lasting, touchable hold..-Hemisqualane: A silicone alternative that improves hair health and strength..-Moringa Seed Oil: Adds lush, lightweight hydration for softness, shine, and dazzling luster...Water/Aqua/Eau, Squalane, Glycerin, Cinnamidopropyltrimonium Chloride, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Hydrogenated Farnesene*, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Tocopherol, Maltodextrin/VP Copolymer, Potassium Sorbate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance/Parfum, Coumarin, Amyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Methyl Ionones, Eugenol, Linalool, Limonene...*Sugarcane Derived Hemisqualane..The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to palms and rub together before gently smoothing down damp mid-shaft and ends, lightly applying remaining product to roots. No heat needed...JVN tip:.-Start with a pea-size amount if your hair is finer, straighter, or if you just desire less hold. .-Air-dry or diffuse and live your best life. .-Can also be used on dry hair for day-two frizz freedom...Recycling Instructions:.-Please refer to your local recycling center for guidance on how to recycle.                                                                                                                                                                                        -Aluminum tube: 100 percent infinitely recyclable. .-Cap: post-consumer-recycled..-Outer packaging: FSC-certified with soy-based ink.

reviews.review_title: Must-have especially when I don't have time!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy the scent, the light texture and subtle fluffing effects it gives to my long hair. I can definitely tell the difference when I use the product before air drying vs when I don't.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING. I have 2a wavy hair that gets weighed down easily and I tried for so long to find products that emphasized my waves without adding frizz. Nothing has ever worked until I randomly decided to buy this. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product amazing everything amazing smell amazing texture a little gose a long way!  Amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have not noticed much difference to my hair and product does not do what it claims with u201cair dry stylingu201d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is okay and I noticed a reduction in frizz, but ultimately for my wavy hair, this doesn't do much of anything, and I decided not to keep it. Like others, I noticed that the packaging should be redesigned for less waste. This was a let down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received this is my Trendmood Box! I have been wanting to try this based on so many good reviews. It did not disappoint! Smells amazing and left my hair so soft and frizz free! For reference, I have mid back length 2B Fine Wavy color treated hair. This helped make is manageable!  Love JVN!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never blow dry my hair because it's so thick and takes forever. This cream is the perfect addition to my routine and makes my hair dry so smooth! It also smells so good, I've been getting so many compliments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in a Trendmood box. I have used this product before, and it works pretty well. You really have to be careful not to use too much though so it doesn't weigh your hair down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in my recent Trendmood Box. It is a really nice styling cream, easy to use. It's not too thick and hard to manage and a little goes a long way. It does take a bit to spread through the hair, but keep at it and resist adding too much. It left my hair silky soft and super shiny and manageable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving it. Works like wonders. I like to use it on wet hair. It helps to reduce frizz.

reviews.review_title: A must - have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very good, it has a good smell, leaves a volume finish and provides quick drying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in a trendmood box; I've used this before and it's not bad but I prefer other products more like from DAE.
Smells nice. Fragrance is not very intense. A little goes a long way. Moisturizes my hair lightly while letting it be fluffy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really looking forward to using this product, however it leaves a heavy film on my hair. You really feel your hair tug as you brush it prewash.

reviews.review_title: Best curly hair product I've ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best curly hair product I've used in over 20 years of wearing my hair naturally curly. I have pretty standard 3A curls, and I have recommended it to people with barely wavy hair to super coily hair, and they all love it too. Perfect for air drying or for diffusing, it makes my hair have zero frizz, it's light weight, and you don't need to scrunch out the crunch that much so you can use it and go out immediately without looking ridiculous. Once it dries you just need to fluff the roots a little bit with your fingers, scrunch lightly depending on how much product you used and your hair texture, and you're good to go! Soft, voluminous, bouncy, shiny hair. Great scent too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally the only product that works on my frizzy hair.  I will say that it takes quite  a bit of product & sometimes I re-apply after the first time while it is drying but if you use enough, it will tame the craziest of manes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recommend this product! I have thin and fairly straight hair and didn't know whether this Air Dry styling cream would do anything for me. However, I really like it! I think air dry cream is great for days when I just want light hold or some protection from frizz when I'm not blow drying. It's easy to use (and difficult to mess up), and it only takes one minute to put through my hair. It's also great that there is such attention to ingredients and environmentally-conscious packaging. Thanks, JVN!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine, mostly wavy hair that I've been growing out for the last year. I ran out of cute styles and was tired of heat styling... this has been the move! It smells great, like a high end mystery product applied at the salon, you know? I'll definitely be repurchasing when this runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my holy grail products. I have used it for a couple years now, and nothing else gives me the same results. I have thick, naturally wavy, frizzy hair, and I almost never use heat tools on my hair - partially to prevent damage and partially because I'm lazy when it comes to my hair. Lucky for me, this air dry cream alone accentuates my natural waves and smooths out frizz so well that I never feel like I am missing out by not blow drying/styling my hair! I also LOVE the scent - it is calming and smells like a high-quality salon product. I have recommended this to others and even given it as gifts, and everyone has fallen in love with it. This will be my go-to for life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have naturally wavy hair and was looking for a product to allow me to air dry while I'm on my healthy hair journey.  the formula comes out like a cream, but after you run your hands together and start rubbing it through your hair, it because almost like a moose texture.  I always use a leave in conditioner after my hair wash and when I went in with this my hair felt dry, but again it's rhe same feeling I would get if I used a hair moose.  as far as hold goes, it seems to do a pretty good Job. I just don't like the feeling of having moose in my hair.  I recommend if you use a hair oil, use the hair oil FIRST then go in with this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have wavy hair that fights between being flat or being frizzy.  I rarely heat style, so I've been trying out different air dry products, and so far this one is the winner.  It somehow adds definition and fights the frizz while keeping my hair soft (no crunch!)  The only drawback I've seen is that there is not a lot of hold, so 2nd day my hair is a little flat and I haven't figured out yet how to revive it after sleeping on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried it once and so far so good! Got the travel size with the Trusted Trio Essentials and I'm looking forward to getting a full size. My only gripe is the scent, a bit strong but worth it for the hold it gives my hair. I applied along with the recovery serum while my hair was wet, combed through, scrunch, dried excess with a tshirt and diffused. I've been doing gel only styling for my hair type but I think I'm gonna give this cream a go for a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for almost two years, and it works really well for my hair-type (I'm Southeast Asian with course, slightly wavy hair). It helps with volume and gives my waves nice hold. My only complaint is the smell, which is quite strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream was given to me as a Christmas present from my son. I fell in love with it after my 1st try. It keeps my hair in control without being stiff or feeling heavy. It's perfection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was included in a best if hair sample box and love it!  I'm going to be buy the full size soon.  The only bother was the tube it's packaged in even with the mini size feels like a waste and tried to get the most out of the tube was a bit of a hassle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: THIS IS THE GOAT! I have tried an endless array of hair creams, gels, everything and nothing has worked like this stuff. It is giving me dream hair and I'm back to buy like, 3 backups because I'm terrified it will get discontinued. I can even throw some in at night and sleep in wet hair and it looks great in the morning. My hair gets very puffy and frizzy so I am thrilled to find this stuff.

reviews.review_title: Love this for slick back styles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this for airdrying my wavy hair but I actually love it even more for slicking my hair into a bun/pony! It is the best product I have found so far for slick backs. Everything else I tried, including Dae, made my hair look greasy. It holds all the hairs in place, smoothes the baby hairs down, and it survives wind and humidity especially if you add a little hairspray at the end.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use the air dry cream daily to help style and strengthen my hair. I love the feel it brings my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Made my hair worse somehow? Dried, frizzy and stringy. Did not help my curls. Loved the scent and the packaging but wish I could have tried a sample since now have to return the full tube. I guess based on ratings that it works well for some, just not for me! I have long 2B hair

reviews.review_title: Love the product, hate the packaging!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product but ultimately will not be repurchasing due to the packaging. JVN please change this to a pump package like the blow out cream! It is a hassle, like an aluminum toothpaste and cracked/leaked and I felt when it got to the end, a lot of product was stuck in the package and wasted.

reviews.review_title: Great deal for an excellent product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this hair cream. It's one of the few products I've tried that gets rid of my frizz & keeps my hair smooth but not oily! It's so lightweight. You don't need much either so it goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: The best air dry curl cream!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have fine, wavy hair and I can let it air dry with no frizz, no extra weight, and no greasiness using this product. I've tried a bunch of products and this is the best!

reviews.review_title: love for my wavy hair it enhances it so well!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the minis as christmas gifts and for me to test it out. I LOVE IT its so light and really enhances my natural waves makes me feel like I don't need to style it and completely takes out any frizz I had I repurchased in the full size :)

reviews.review_title: Did not like scent and greasy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Strongly scented in a tropical way. I didn't like the fragrance. Goes on heavy feeling and did nothing for my curly hair. Felt weighed down and very greasy/highly perfumed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this product, I have a very oily scalp so some hair products don't work for me but this product did wonders for my hair without making my hair greasy. Feels so nice and smells great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing on curly hair whether thick or fine hair. I combine it with an anti humidity ouidad climate control gel for a longer hold in the summer back east.. smells so good. I use a lot so that I have plenty of frizz free defined curls and let my hair air dry and then I leave it alone and its great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best product I have found for my wavy 2B hair & for scrunching. It holds the waves without leaving the hair feeling hard, crunchy, and frozen!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so bad! Sadly, it just made my wavy hair frizzy. I do like the smell and consistency though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for the past year or so and it has been a game changer for my curly hair!  Anytime I wear my hair natural and curly (and it is SUPER curly naturally) this product has made my curls look beautiful and so easy to manage.  I LOVE it!

reviews.review_title: Low maintenance hair styling at its best!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great for my fine curly hair when I just want to enjoy some versatility from blow drying straight. You have to work with it a bit, getting the right curls or wave for you. Easy hair day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this product from a free sample with an in-store pickup and used it on a whim one morning where I didn't have time to do my hair. This works so well for my wavy hair that can't handle heavy product by being defining but weightless at the same time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally my favorite thing ever. It defines your waves/curls amazingly while also not weighing them down. Truly a game changer and worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally my holy grail for my curly hair! I hate diffusing my hair because I'm lazy but putting this in my hair after the shower gives the same effect as diffused curls when it dries!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my fine hair! My hair gets weighed down so easily, which I hate because it needs all the volume it can get. This is light and helps control all the wispy strands, while also giving a lot of shine and manageability. The scent is light and fresh, and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! It definitely reduces frizz in my hair when I use it after a shower. It makes my hair very smooth and soft. It also has a pleasant scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Applied to my damp hair after a clarifying wash following a terrible salon experience that left my once full and wavy hair feeling thin and straight; cut to one air dry later and my waves and curls are coming back without frizz!   Tested again without a clarifying wash and same results, just be sure not to use too much if your hair is prone to greasiness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ugh I wanna love this so bad but it kills my curls. I get more frizz somehow?? I have very thick curly hair and if I use enough of this to help with frizz, my hair is greasy. If I use a smaller amount, frizzes me more.

reviews.review_title: All day waves for fine, straight hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine, thick hair that is normally very straight. This not only dries fast, it gives me all day waves. My hair stylist thought I'd curled my hair! (Nope, just this stuff.) It doesn't get rid of frizz for me, so I use smoothing cream w/ it on rainy days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this because I love the blow dry cream but there is something about the smell of this product I just can't get past.

reviews.review_title: Enhances my natural texture, love this product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this air dry cream! Enhances my naturally wavy hair without making it crunchy. Also help with frizz and does not make my hair my greasy at all. Scent is very light and natural. Love love this product!! It's allowed me to wear my hair naturally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased after getting a free trial. I am a believer in a heat free hair routine, and this product is my go-to after a shower. I recently tried pairing it with Chierosa 59 perfume & it's becoming more of my signature scent. It smells good. It makes your hair feel good. I walk confidently around and always shoutout JVN air dry cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is perfect for heatless curls. I have fine, black hair that dries fairly straight. I put this in on my hair damp, wrap it up in unicorn method and I wake up with a Dyson-level blowout. Love it!  absolutely no heat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product is great. I used it for a slicked back ponytail. Now that I've cut my hair short, I used it to slick my hair back. Or add some texture to curls. It holds very naturally in the hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free sample and loved it soooo much that I just had to get the full size. I have curly hair and I feel like this helps give my hair good curl structure whenever I use it. I apply it after my shower along with my other hair products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Makes my hair lay very nicely instead of being frizzy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I converted! I traded out Redken and American Cree for JVM.   All of your formulas are amazing! I love the air dry cream u2013 I didn't know this type of product existed and I'm happy to have found it. Thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This I believe is definitely made for curly hair girlies but I myself have straight, fine hair and it still even did wonders!! Tamed my frizz, and I let this sit in my hair and air dry,& it felt so smooth&looked incredible

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received the mini size of this in my store pick up order and tried it today. First of all, I love the fragrance! Unlike some reviewers, I do not find it overpowering at all. I applied it to damp hair and did find it to be slightly crunchy as it air dried, but after blowing drying it was a dream! My hair was so smooth and soft!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My teenage son, who has thick, curly, medium length hair, LOVES this product! It gives him definition in his curls and a little shine too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don't listen to the bad reviews bro. it smells SO GOOD. literally makes my hair BUTTERY SOFT, air dry or blow dried like a dream. changed my hair completely. worth the money. unless you have nasty hair then idk what to tell you this does wonders for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made my hair feel coated and almost crunchy I immediately wanted to wash it after putting it on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: after using this product for about a month, it did absolutely nothing for my hair. I didn't see a single difference at all and the packaging leaked everywhere and eventually tore open at the sides.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love JVN products and  this air dry cream is great  I do not use a hairdryer and leave my hair to dry. I use before brushing and when dry this stops my hair from being frizzy or fly away. It is now a must have in my routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally found a curl cream that isn't crunchy, doesn't weigh down my hair, and defines. My new one and only!

reviews.review_title: It works for curls, but you need something else
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have curly, colored dark blonde, very dry hair. The two pics are no product (after hairwash then air dry), and after hairwash, used JVN, then air dry. It definitely gave my curls shape and made them less frizzy, but didn't get rid of the frizz/flyaways entirely. Needed to use oil/another product to finish once dry. I'll use the whole tube, but will try something else next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is what I've been looking for! It helps create soft, non crunchy waves that keep their shape without a post-cast film or flakes that gel creates. Also great for 2nd day hair refreshes and fly aways.

reviews.review_title: there are better options out there for curls
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is scented, but it is not overpowering and dissapates with time. I have 3C porous curls, and found that the best results came from styling damp hair and getting one hand wet to emulsify a dime size amount between two hands and then apply. I typically rake or sandwich my hands, using about 4 dollops on different sections. After diffusing your curls will be shiny and bouncy, but this product has no hold and frizz will set in by the end of the day. No day two even with a bonnet. Only 3 stars because it dries my hair out badly no matter what oil or leave-in I use with it, and for all the application work it has no hold.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine hair but a decent amount and this is the perfect thing for a slick back pony/bun look. It holds my hair really well without making it super greasy/sticky/hard. I'll wear it all day and it'll last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first curl cream that hasn't left my hair feeling crunchy or weighed down. Whenever I use this cream and let my hair air dry, I get compliments ever single time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I keep trying this hoping for good results but it just my hair dull and lifeless so that's not good but my daughter who has healthier hair had better results

reviews.review_title: Blow dry results without the heat damage!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've struggled with my hair texture for ages and this leaves my hair straight and frizz free, & so soft. I used to blow dry my hair daily and damage it with heat but not i get better results without hurting my hair!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used this for the first time today and omg! Creamy, not sticky at all! It smells a lot like biolage products' signature scent, but clean ingredients! I have fine, ringlet curly hair and this defined my curls without crunch and left my hair shiny! Love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail! Can't live without this product. It truly does it all! It's hydrating, thickening, and my hair looks so much better after using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells really strong and it's not the grapefruit smell that I like. Even looking past the fragrance, I don't find it effective at all on dry hair. It leaves a stiff texture on my waves.

reviews.review_title: Good for air drying wavy hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this product to help take my naturally wavy hair, and it does a great job! Smells great and works really good. Leaves my soft and keeps the waves pretty nice for the next day.

reviews.review_title: A Staple in My Hair Routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must in my hair care routine! My blowouts last longer when use this, I notice the flipped ends intact for days! Also great to slick hair back into a bun or pony. Have been using it for years and will continue to repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: JVN Air Dry Cream: A Love Story with Some Twists
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: JVN Hair has taken the hair world by storm, promising salon-worthy looks without the heat. Their Air Dry Cream is a popular product, but like any haircare hero, it has its strengths and weaknesses. Let's dive into the world of air-dried waves to see if this cream deserves a permanent spot on your bathroom shelf.  Love at First Sniff: One thing's for sure, JVN Air Dry Cream knows how to make an entrance. The scent is intoxicating, often described as a clean, citrusy floral that lingers long after application. It's like a mini salon experience every time you use it.  The Good Hair Days: When it comes to appearance, JVN Air Dry Cream delivers for many. It enhances natural waves and curls, adding body and definition without weighing hair down. Frizz is kept at bay, leaving you with sleek, polished strands that look effortlessly chic. Think beachy waves with a touch of sophistication.  Quality Concerns: Customers appreciate the high-quality ingredients and cruelty-free formula. The cream feels luxurious and applies smoothly, without any greasiness or stickiness.  The Tangled Tale: Now, here's where things get a little messy. Opinions on performance, texture, and frizz control are divided. Some rave about the cream's ability to define their curls and tame frizz, while others find it leaves their hair dry, stiff, or with unwanted crunch. The texture can also be a sticking point, with some describing it as too heavy or tacky.  The Final Verdict: JVN Air Dry Cream is a love story with some twists. It has the potential to elevate your air-dried look, offering salon-quality shine and definition. However, it's not a one-size-fits-all solution. If you have fine, easily weighed-down hair or struggle with dryness, proceed with caution. But for those with thicker hair or defined waves, it could be your new holy grail.

reviews.review_title: Brought my hair back from the dead
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been consistently visiting my stylist every 8 weeks for the past 10 years for highlights. My hair used to be soft, long and naturally wavy. Haven't seen these attributes in a long time due to using bleach so many years..  lo and behold, received the trial size in my sephora delivery bag. Absolutely adore Jonathan, and tried it right away.  I was pretty shocked to feel my damaged blonde  shoulder blade length hair soft, wavy and HEALTHY looking. It literally looked like I styled it on purpose. Threw some dry shampoo in and walked out the door. Compliments at work too. Basically struck gold.  I think a little goes a long way. My hair is fine, so used a pea sized amount at first on damp hair. Let it do its thing and dry naturally. Hair felt like butter once dried.  When I want some lift, I'll work in a volumizing product into my roots and JVN at the ends.   Continuing to purchase full size because using it on my daughters butt length, thiiick wavy hair as well.  Works so great, been slowly phasing out other products as Air dry cream is getting the job done of 3 other prducts and is thankfully affordable.    I guess some noses are having an aversion to the smell? To be honest, I didnt think it had the most prominent scent when I first used it. It wasn't very strong or noticeable to me as a signature scent would be with other products.  Now that I think of it, it smells like the love child of Biosilk and Sebastian from back in the day.  Since I've moved on to the full size tube, passing along the barely used mini size to my hair colorist so she can try it as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This might be my new favorite styling product. I have dry, medium-thick wavy hair and I'm not usually happy with how my waves look unless I whip out my diffuser to dry my hair. I don't always have time to diffuse, and I've been experimenting with different product combos to see if it's possible to achieve the effect I want on air-dried hair. I picked this up on a whim in-store because of the name, knowing nothing about it, and I figured I'd return it if I didn't like it.  I've used this as my only styling product on my last three wash days, and I absolutely love how my hair looks! My waves are defined and they last longer than they ever have before. I don't find that this dries my hair out at all or creates any frizz. It has a light, sweet scent that fades almost immediately once it's in my hair. If it continues to perform the way it has, it will be a forever repurchase for me.

reviews.review_text: Love this product for my wavy hair and it smells amazing! I comb this product through my hair, scrunch up the waves and let it air dry for perfect beach hair!

I wanted to love it but I couldn't get past the fact that my day two hair was not fixable with this product. I was left with crunchy hair after a second use on damp hair.

It made my hair feel thicker, not weighed down the way silicones and oils tend to do. It beautifully brought out the layers in my haircut.  Because I've been an avid gel user for decades, I liked how this makes my hair slightly crunchy after it air dries, but once you comb it through there is no residue and no feeling of stiffness.  Needless to say I rushed back to the store to buy a full sized tube :)

Unfortunately, it wasn't hydrating at all on my 3b/3c curls, actually causing more frizz than I have with other styling products. I do think that this helped to make my curls more defined but they were dry and my hair felt coarse. After an hour or so I noticed some of my curls turned into fluffy sections and I had to rewet them and add more product which was frustrating as this product seems to be advertised as a wash and go type situation. I think this would be better described as strictly a texturizing cream since I don't think it does anything for moisture, frizz, or hold. I bought the full size so I'm going to keep experimenting with it using different amounts and apply when my hair is more or less soaking wet to see if it makes any difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Simply the best product. I adore JVN. There is a trick to application. If you watch JVN's tutorial he shows you the tips. Also, you do need to do some curl Twirling with your fingers and scrunching. I also use this will a gel and the combo is divine. JVN knows his stuff. The smell is strong, however. I do love it, but I can see how it could be a drawback.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this cream tamed my wild hair and effects last between shampoos.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've got this product for free for review purposes. This product is a game changer!! Gives me a smoother texture, soft hair feeling without changing the natural shape of the hair but controlling the frizz so it looks like a healthier hair and that way I can avoid to blow dry my hair so often

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Being a mom of three toddlers, I don't have time to style my hair. Heck, I barely have time to wash my hair, so pretty much air dry is my go-to styling method every time. But since my hair is constantly undergoing color treatments, it gets dry and looks frizzy if I don't style it with tools after every wash. So needless to say, I was surprised at how this air dry cream really helped to smooth my frizziness and let my hair naturally be styled effortlessly. It also smells refreshingly great. Doesn't make my hair greasy or feel heavy. It just makes your hair look healthy and soft. I really am a fan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it so much! It helps tames the frizz specially. I thought my hair is damaged but it was only frizzy and this cream fixed it.

reviews.review_title: Not Great for Thick Dry Hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing! But doesn't really do much for thick long hair. My hair was extremely frizzy after using this, and didn't feel hydrated. I think there are way better options on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have to use a very small amount otherwise my hair feels sticky but I guess needing little product is a good thing? My hair is straight so sometimes it can weight it down. I imagine it must work great for curly hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: beautiful hold for my 2c curls! plus the container is bougee AF

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have 2b/2c hair. My strands are fine so it's easy for my hair to get weighed down by products and not curl at all. This product blew me away! It makes my waves and curls so defined and bouncy, whether I let it air dry or diffuse it. A little goesa long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my hair feel soft, shiny and smooth.. I scrunch it in after towel drying and brushing and my hair drys in a nice wave.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this product from influencer to try. I have frizzy hair so it helps with it some what.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure I have the right hair type for this. I found it made my hair kinda gross, even if I only put a little bit in. I also found my hair to have the same amount of frizz as when I air dry without product.  I really love other JVN products but this was not it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Before this product, I used to have horribly frizzy hair. This has literally solved all my hair problems! Obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells absolutely amazing and I love the way my hair feels after it dries. It is fantastic!

reviews.review_title: Not as Good as the Milk
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the JVN Complete Hydrating Air Dry Cream but I didn't love it. It didn't provide enough moisture for my very dry and curly/coily hair. Although it somewhat worked, I felt like the control it provided wasn't sufficient. My hair was out of control within an hour or too much movement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My hair became dry,frizzy and brittle over the winter months. ( Northern Canada ) At first I was hesitant to try because of the complaints about the smell. Honestly I actually don't mind the smell. I don't find it to be over powering at all. I noticed happier hair after the first use. By my second use my hair was soft and had volume again. It definitely has helped in reviving my hair and I would recommend this brand and product.

reviews.review_title: Get a human sized fly swatter.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sometimes things are better when not used for their intended use.  I am giving this 5 stars not because it is a great hair product but because it is a great aphrodisiac.  Better at getting attention than pheromones imho 10/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I could not get past the smell of this product. Very heavy fragrance that I noticed in my hair for hours after I had applied it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this product has completely floored me. i've always had a love hate relationship with my hair. it's very thick, coarse, and has the tendency to be frizzy and tangled. i also have different textures throughout my hair that range from straight/wavy to ringlet curls which make it difficult to find one single product that works for me.  most curl creams/antifrizz products i've used work for the curly part of my hair but leave the straight/wavy part feeling crunchy and stringy. i'm also not the type of person to have an elaborate curl routine, and most days i don't use heat on it or do anything to style it (i'm lazy). i fell in love with this product on the first day i used it. i don't feel it in my hair at all, but after air drying i suddenly had all the definition, silkyness, and hydration i've always wanted. it seems to have even brought out the texture in the part of my hair that usually dries straight. it's feels very much my hair but better). using it is a breeze which is great for those of us who are clueless when it comes to styling hair and it smells great too! i can see how it might not work for some hair types, it could be to heavy for some or not have enough hold for others, but if your hair sounds like mine i would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing, feels like a soft blowout. My hair feels soo soft and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have pin straight fine hair so most products weigh it down or make it look greasy so I was worried to try this specially when it came out of the tube super creamy. But... it was amazing. I let my hair air dry and it was super smooth with no fly aways. Then later that night I styled it and it helps so well. Easy to use, great smell, and fantastic ingredients... will def add to my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Post shower I brush this through my hair and French braid pigtails a little loose then go to bed. In the morning my hair is soft and has no frizz and holds these beautiful soft waves all day long. This has been my go to for lazy amazing hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After applying to damp hair it takes a while to see the full effect! Hair has to be completely aired dried. It starts off looking frizzy but once hair is completely dried it has no more frizz and smells great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell!! My gosh, the scents of the JVN line are just sooo different than any other lines I have tried. Unique and soooo good!!  Not to mention, this cream is GOLD. If you have curly hair you need this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many many creams to reduce my frizziness and define my waves/curls. This has been the best product for that without making it oily or ruined curls. In love!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Mediocre air dry styler. Bumble & Bumble and Crown Affair products are much better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start off by saying that I absolutely adore this product. It's hydrating and smells good but also has clean ingredients which I appreciate. It's not sticky and doesn't leave any sort of weird film on your hair. I find that it works great in my hair if I air dry or blow dry. It leaves my hair looking healthier, smoother and shinier and smelling like a hair salon! Overall, I'd recommend the product that's inside the component.  That being said, I HATE this packaging. In fact, I hate the packaging of two out of the three JVN products I've tried. This foil type tube is so hard to squeeze and once you get towards the bottom you end up wasting a fair bit of product. Want to cut it open and use the last of it that way? Don't. You'll cut yourself.   I really adore this product and it did last me a decent amount of time but the packaging is infuriating. I really hope they find a way to put this in a normal squeeze tube. I'm going to try a few other similar products with better packaging first but if they don't work out then I'd absolutely come back to this. Maybe I'll just have my boyfriend squeeze it out for me lol

J'ai achete cette creme sur un coup de tu00eate, mais je ne l'ai pas regrette! Quand je me lave les cheveux et utilise cette creme, mes cheveux bouclent tellement qu'une amie croyait que j'etais allee chez la coiffeuse! Je suis maintenant une fan inconditionnelle de ce produit!

reviews.review_title: My favorite and only product I need to use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've searched for the perfect product for curly hair my entire life and I've finally found the one! Thank you JVN u2764ufe0f the first pic is day 1 (lightly diffused and air dried the rest of the way) the second pic is day 2.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this didn't work for me, I have bleached blond hair and it feel very dry after use, I've used it a few times over the last 2 months. My hair is wavy/curly and while it gives enough definition for lazy days when I don't want a full routine, I don't like how dry it leaves my hair. I also deslike the smell, for me it smells like medicine and while I'm not really sensitive to things like that it doesn't make me want to use it. Shame bc it's a really big tube, will probably give it away to my mom and see how she likes it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells AMAZING!!!! This product is great but this is not an air dry cream. I love that it offers great moisture and scent but on wet hair my hair felt very sticky. I felt the best benefit is the smell! If you prefer non scented items, run! But if you want to smell amazing, grab some!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new go to for the days when I don't feel like using heat on my hair. To be honest, I would buy this for the smell alone. Your hair will literally smell like you just walked out of a high end salon. They need to make a shampoo and conditioner line with this scent because I'm obsessed.  I use this when my hair is still damp and either rake it into my hair with my fingers or scrunch it in (like how you would apply mousse) if I want my curls more defined. Love this product so much!!

reviews.review_title: Didn't add definition but eliminated frizz
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This didn't do what I was hoping it what do. I scrunch my hair after showering and was hoping this would give my waves more definition. It basically erased my waves, but did eliminate frizz. It made my hair soft but also made my ends a little crunchy. I think it would be good if you have straight hair and curls that don't need added definition

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great but the name is misleading: this is not an air dry cream. When using on damp hair an not styling, my hair was sticky and heavy. However, when I used it before blowing out my curls or adding gel to enhance the curls, this cream offered great moisture and scent. I am obsessed with how this product smells and I would honestly buy it in a body spray (like how morrocanoil did theirs) but if you are highly sensitive to smells, this is not the product for you

reviews.review_title: Great for days you don't want to blow dry!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. I love how it allows my curls to form effortlessly when air drying, and love the feel of my hair once it's all dry! Leaves my hair nice and soft, and the smell is soooo good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair
reviews.review_text: i really wanted to like this product as it was recommended to me and smells amazing, but i just feel like it doesn't work the best for my hair type. it could be how i was using it in combination with other hair products like gel, but i noticed less defined curls and more frizz than when i use my preferred cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light weighted and made my hair less frizzy, but the smell really reminded me of my toilet spray. I wish they had a fragrance free version

reviews.review_title: Effortless for a lazy 5 minute routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm on my second tube! I only use this for wash days as it can be heavy and give uneven clumping for in-between styles. For reference, I have medium density wavy hair and a slightly oily scalp.  WASH DAY: I squeeze as much moisture from my hair as I can with a t-shirt, detangle with a lightweight oil, and use a total of 2 quarter-sized dollops of product to sectioned hair. I scrunch my hair with my hands or a t-shirt to promote curl clumps and let it air dry.  I'm left with touchably soft waves, shine and minimal frizz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for weeks and it's amazing. I have thick frizzy hair and live in a humid climate. This cream is Everything I've ever wanted in a hair product. This makes my hair soft, shiny, and reduces frizz SIGNIFICANTLY!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First impression...sticky. Made my hair more texture as it was air drying. Probably was too heavy for my hair or something. I don't think I used it wrong or anything. Followed directions to the tea.

reviews.review_title: This is the air dry cream you've been waiting for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best air dry cream I have ever used, period. First, it smells amazing. That's always a nice plus.It feels so nice going into your hair, it's so silky smooth. It doesn't leave residue or a crunchy texture like others I have used. You are just left with your own perfect texture. Buy this!
This product gave a very dry and solid affect to my hair and reduced the volume of my hair over time. Smells nice but that was not my purpose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This didn't do anything for my hair. I feel like it almost made it more brittle..? I can see how it would be better for someone with textured hair, mine is extremely straight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was debating buying this because I didn't love the smell, but I love trying clean hair products. I put a little of my sample on my hand to ask my husband if he liked the smell and my skin started burning and formed a little red rash where I put this product! Nothing else was on my skin! I am so glad I only tried this in a small section of hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the way this product makes my hair feel. I originally on bought the mini, but went back for the full size. I use it every hair wash

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a huge fan of the scent but it did seem to hydrate my hair a little. My hair wasn't as dull and seemed softer after air drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got this sample size and had to buy the full size. It makes my fine often frizzy hair so soft and shiny and never greasy. The scent is a plus+ so light and clean. I would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is interesting. It gives me a bit of texture when i air dry, which is pretty useful for when i want to style my hair and need a bit of grip. Smells amazing and i had no issues with the tube, no product was rushing out or anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to like this product, however, after trying the air dry cream in a number of different ways, ultimately it just doesn't do the job. It dries out my long wavy hair, and gives it an unpleasant texture. I did not find it moisturizing or helpful.

reviews.review_title: Good for thick, coarseu2026 but straightu2026 hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is thick, coarse and straight. This product seriously cuts down on the frizz, but doesn't weigh hair down. It's in heavy rotation for warmer weather ahead - no miracles - but better with it than without

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my girlfriend uses this product... I used it on Tuesday on my mid to ends after washing. it broke my neck out in an allergic rash and triggered an awful itch response on my scalp as well. aside from the allergic reaction, it didn't do anything for my medium/coarse, thick, curly hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought the large as loved the smell and the idea that it would work... did nothing for my blond wavy med length and med thickness hair... actually made it more dry and parched looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not bad, but not good. I really found it made no difference to my hair. ufffcIf anything it almost makes it look more dry. It does smell nice though. ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A nice product for the air dry girlies. Sometimes I just can't be bothered to blow dry my hair and I turn to this cream. It helps keep my frizziness down without weighing my hair down.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful to speed up and upgrade air drying!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This thing is awesome! I got a small size because I was curious. I'm someone with slightly wave hair, and I like to airdry my hair as much as possible. However, I sometimes find that that can take a while, and will leave my hair a little bit frizzy. This tones that down, quickens the dry time, and all without removing any of my natural volume.  The best part is that using this doesn't feel like it's weighing down my hair in the longterm. It's also really well priced for the amount you get, I have been using this for two months every other day and am just now getting to the halfway point of the travel size.

reviews.review_title: Love Love Love (only w/a blow dryer)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this after getting sew in extensions. I use it as a primer to actually blowdrying my hair though. (Results for air dry were close to a wet Gremlin after midnight.) It maintains gloss, volume, and curls for days. I am IN LOVE with this product and only wish it came in  a larger container. My natural hair has been bleached for twenty years, strawlike, and stringy. This product blends the two harmoniously!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First use and this is already a must have for the rest of my life. I have wavy/slightly curly hair. Normally air drying makes me look like a bridge troll. This stuff made my hair extra curly, soft, bouncy, and about 75% less frizz. obsessed.

reviews.review_title: Effortless styler to add to your repertoire!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great no-fuss hair styler! Will it eliminate all frizz and leave you with perfect ringlet curls? No, but it helps you nail the u201cyour hair, straight out the shower, but betteru201d look. It feels kind of thick straight out of the tube, and even as you're applying, but it left my hair feeling like it didn't have any product in it at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: really wanted to love this and gave it a couple of months of trying it out but I just cannot get behind it. it leaves my naturally fine & wavy/frizzy hair feeling sticky and tangled. after towel drying my hair I put a dime-sized amount of this in my hands and smooth it over the mid-lengths to the ends of my hair and then scrunch. it somehow just leaves my hair feeling worse than if I put nothing in it. the smell is very nice though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used plenty of curl and dry creams so I would not have to style my hair much in the mornings after I shower. This cream is PURE magic for my super thick, 2a wavy hair. It allows my waves to form without becoming frizzy or falling flat. I am absolutely obsessed! My good friend who also has thinner but also wavy hair has said it has tamed her frizz as well. I got her hooked on it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves an amazing non sticky no cast hold! Not a curl definer and it doesn't make your hair straighter. It just makes your hair the best it can be. It makes your hair soft and silky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing. I put in my hair after I shower and go to to bed, I wake up to tamed naturally curly hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this hair cream! Leaves my hair soft and sleek. No frizz. And it smells great!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff!  I got this as a sample and will be buying the full size right away.  I have fine wavy hair and this doesn't weigh my hair down.  It makes it feel so soft and it defines my natural wave nicely .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is actually the best. I rarely write reviews. This is so lightweight but gives my normally frizzy waves the smoothing that it needs! I did not expect to enjoy this so much. Purchased a mini size to start (honestly think I just loved the packaging tbh)

reviews.review_title: My HG styling product for 2a hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample to try with my 2a hair and ended up loving it so much I bought the full size as soon as the sample ran out! I feel like I've finally found my HG hair product for non-wash days. I found this product works best when I diffuse rather than air drying but I've gotten good results from both. It holds my curl well and boost the volume quite a bit without sacrificing texture. Really glad I got to try this. A knockout product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the gentle hold on my wavy hair when it is air-dryer, and especially the softness from regular use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this air dry cream! I have tried plenty of hair products and this one is buy far my favourite! My hair is soft, and shiny. I can go longer in between washes as well because it doesn't make my hair greasy at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I. LOVE. THIS. It's perfect when I don't have time to blow dry my hair or don't want to! It adds shine and takes away my frizz! (I have frizzy thin straight hair) It does exact what it says it will do. I've tried so many and this is the best!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff might be magic. I have stick straight, fine hair that has never held curl. I put this cream in my hair and it instantly started forming its own ringlets! I gasped! I am going to try it out today again with a diffuser to see what happens. I've dreamed of natural curls since I was a little girl and now I've found a product that can actually give them to me.  I didn't honest feel like it helped my frizz at all, but the curling aspect has me sold!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really liking this hair cream.  Got as a sample.  I'm obsessed with leave-in conditioners (always have been) because if I don't use one, my hair is frizzy and unmanageable.  I'll use a good one for years!  I have wavy, coarse hair that isn't as full as it used to be.  This cream isn't oily at all.  It doesn't make my hair look wet and crispy.  I don't like a wet, hairsprayed look.  I use a nickel sized drop, maybe a little less.  I rub my hands together to distribute, and finger comb thru my wet hair.  A little goes a long way.  My hair looks full and soft and shiny after using.  Sometimes I combine w/a pump of Olaplex #6  * I'm not crazy about the smell.  It reminds me of old school Biolage products, which reminds me of the 90's, when leave-in conditioner was the least if my problems!  Haha!  But I like it enough to keep using it!   xo fin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the idea but I cannot get past the smell. It smells like the air freshener they put in a port-a-potty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells ahhhhhmazing!  Left my hair feeling weightless and my natural curls came out. Perfect for my fine blonde hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: does NOTHING! useless step in your routine and when i mixed it with other products it broke up into oily mess

reviews.review_title: Absolutely need this for fine, curly hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So this is the first time I have ever felt compelled to write a review. This stuff is FANTASTIC! Leaves my chin length, fine, curly hair soft and totally frizz free, and the parts that I use a curling iron on stay curly for days! I have used other air dry creams in the past that made the situation worse or had no impact at all, but this will be a staple for me from here on out. I use a tiny (lima bean-sized) amount, so this will last me a long time.

reviews.review_title: A must-have that I will be repurchasing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I air dry my hair every day. Because my hair is relatively fine, most leave-in products weigh it down. This product is a game-changer for me!!! It's very light and subtle and I notice a difference in frizz and shine. The scent is inoffensive. A good buy

I was so excited to use the JVN complete hydrating air dry hair cream. Unfortunately, it did absolutely nothing for my hair. I realized after doing my research that all the nice results shown on the internet were on individuals who genetically have nice fine hair . I'm so disappointed and I will not be using this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed. This stuff is perfect for curly hair.

reviews.review_text: This is the curl enhancer this fine- haired white girl has been looking for! I put it in after i use a leave in conditioner or oil and it keeps my wavy curls together, super soft, and bouncy for days!

reviews.review_text: I have fine, soft, 2C hair. If you are a curly hair girl you understand that gel and mouse leave a cast and then you scrunch out the cast and it leaves your curls soft. This product kind of stays tacky in my hair and does not scrunch out to be soft. Also, I feel like it made my hair less shiny and somehow frizzier. Maybe I'm using it wrong but the texture of it in my dry hair is a no from me dawg.

reviews.review_text: This helps with frizz mostly but it makes my hair look greasy and bleh (I only put it on ends but still makes it look greasy. I have very fine, flat hair and maybe it's just too heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I love this product it is really good and it make my hair smell amazing and it has an amazing texture, this rn is o e of my favorite products from this brand because this product also works for curly hair. I recommend this pproduct
This product works so well on my thin texture curly/wavy hair. Also is smells WONDERFUL! I love that I can use it on wet and dry hair. I highly recommend for a low maintenance hair routine.

reviews.review_title: A must have for all stylists!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a hairstylist and all I can say...  Is WOW! This blow-dry milk is what smooth, frizz free dreams are made of! I not only use it on myself but also my clients. It gives my medium thick/ frizzy hair that sleek look without it feeling or looking greasy.  And I barely use my flatiron after, that is how luxuriously soft this makes my hair feel! All and All I think this is an amazing product for anyone that want a soft blowout look! 10/10 woukd recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very frizzy hair and this has improved it drastically. I put this stuff (about a nickel size) on each half of my hair when it's damp and when it's dry, it's not frizzy at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and OMG IT'S GREAT!! I have curly hair it leaves looking great without freeze and my curls feel bouncy and defined. I'm ordering the full size.
This gave my lifeless curls life! Normally my hair would air dry frizzy and wavy. But this actually gave me some of my curls back!

reviews.review_title: Will buy the full size soon
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does it what it says. I have frizzy, dry, and wavy hair. After washing I towel dry and apply, comb thru and my hair is left soft, frizz free and without need to heat style. I love it. The scent is a plus. Nice clean fresh sand light. I got it as a 100 pt. Perk to try out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Another good one by JVN. I use a pea sized amount on my damp hair, after a little hair serum :) I lightly diffuse it and it turns out so soft and shiny.  I have very long fine hair. The thing about JVN I find,is that I need sooo little. It takes time to find the right amount my hair needs.  To much and it's a sticky mess but a very little and my hair is soft and smoothed. The best part about this, for me,  is that the effects last for days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: nice product, difficult to get out of tube

reviews.review_text: I love this product, and would buy it again, but the tube that it came in is metal, and is really hard to squeeze.  JVN please rethink your packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick, dry and frizzy hair. When I air dry it without any Product it gets super puffy, the texture feels a little rough and looks pretty much dead. When I read that it smoothes frizz And softens the hair while giving it shine I was ecstatic!! It did not disappoint! I applied a good amount because I have a lot of hair and very long, it has a good scent not too overpowering, and a cream like  texture. It definitely tamed the frizz and gave some life to my hair. The moringa oil in this gave my hair some shine. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone with the same issues as myself. My hair once fully dried for once looked very nice and semi styled and with pide most importantly.

reviews.review_title: Makes hair look greasy. Don't recommend !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was persuaded into buying this by those associates at Sephora. They are not Sephora employees, they are actually the product's sales people selling their own product. I mistook her for a Sephora associate and asked which product will be good for my frizzy hair She obviously swore by this. I have been using this for a month now and I think I will discontinue it at this point. Does not work for me at all. Not only it makes my hair look greasy, it doesn't tame my frizz as well. She made me buy this cream and the hair oil from this same brand. She said to mix the two and apply throughout the hair.  I wash my hair after 2-3 days and usually don't have any buildup of oil. After using these two products I started noticing my hair got super greasy on the night of second day. By 3rd day it felt as if I had applied oil in my hair!!!  I started using each product individually and on the ends only even that didn't make a difference. Of course the top of my head wasn't as oily as I applied to end only, but still I like to tie my hair in a bun on top of my head and I think the residue transfers. Such a big tube and bottle, waste of money. Don't recommend this at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Influenster in a vox box to review. I like it, but I don't really use much cream products bc I feel like I can always feel them in my hair. I'm not sure how much I loved this product for my hair, but I think it would work well for people who like creams. It smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have an odd attraction for some JVN products but this one just left my hair in a frizzed-out mess. Returned.

reviews.review_title: Not much I enjoyed about this product.

reviews.review_text: DO NOT BUY!! I love the idea of an air dry cream because I never use heat on my hair so I don't require heat protecting ingredients in my products. Sure this cream gave me curl definition, but it made my hair so so so dry, crunchy, and brittle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So happy to find a flexible hair product that works on my frizzy hair AND it's in sustainable packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. This is the only styling product I use for my 2B wavy fine hair, it has medium hold and performs better that all the curl creams, gels or mousses I've tried in the past. I apply it  by section on wet hair after my leave-in conditioner, scrunch and diffuse and I'm good to go!

reviews.review_text: Wavy/curly folx: do not run, do not walk, effing sprint! My hair NEVER air dries well, and this takes away frizz and adds texture without being crunchy. Plus, the smell is everything.ud83dude0d
