reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It styled well and provides a natural hold without leaving your hair crunchy or greasy. I'm a big fan of products that give the illusion of a natural look. Also, eliminates hat hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is nice and lightweight. I use it after I get out of the shower and run in through my hair. Once my hair was dry it was soft and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't normally love air dry creams as they sit heavy in my thin hair, but this stuff is wonderful! Gives texture and shine to my normally straight flat hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am SO IMPRESSED with this product! My hair has always been really frizzy. I've tried so many hydrating products and different hair routines, but nothing has worked as well as this JVN cream! My hair is wavy and I usually use a curl cream when my hair is wet. This doesn't define curls/waves quite as well as a curl cream would, but my waves still look nice, and it seriously reduces frizz.  I like to put this cream in at night after I've showered and then sleep on it. When I wake up in the morning I just finger comb my hair (usually it takes a lot of time to make my hair neat, so this product has been a game changer!  Bonus: it smells lovely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My hair loves this stuff, it has essentially replaced my other hair care products. Also, it smells salon quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm impressed. I've used so many products that don't actually do anything noticeable but when I use this, my hair just looks SO good. I still use leave-in first because I have thick frizzy curls but if I think fine hair could get away with this as a one-and-done product. It replaces styling cream, oil and gel in my routine! My curls *bounce* when I wear this and my hair has not been bouncy EVER. I love it. I got a mini but I'm going FS next time.

reviews.review_title: Love JVN  Hair but this was a Miss for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like some of the other items in this line - the serum and blow dry lotion are fabulous - but this product was just a big miss for me.     Left my hair in no hair land - not wavy, not straight, not curly, not really frizzy but not smooth, and puffy to boot.   I get better results air drying with the serum alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample, but just bought a full size! I love using this to lessen the frizz after air drying, and gives a little volume. I just spritz on some leave in conditioner then smooth this in after washing my hair and it works wonders. I will warn, there is a strong ish scent to this, so anyone sensitive to that might not like it as much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream for beachy, non crunchy waves. I use it to smooth frizz and give life to my hair. It's a staple when I'm too lazy to blow-dry. I have a lot of thin, long hair, and I just crunch it in, twist a few strands and I'm good to go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cream! It is a must have in my hair care routine. It adds amazing definition to my curls.
I use this on my dry hair, and it makes my hair very shiny, soft, frizz-free, and healthy. Highly recommend.

I love air drying, even though I don't always have the time for it, so a product like this one is a must have for me! I feel like it cuts down on drying time amongst significantly improving the appearance of my hair. I noticed less frizz, more volume, and hair that looks and feels more moisturized and all around more healthy. It has a  light fresh scent that I reallt enjoy and the texture is a light cream that applies well and doesn't weight the hair down

It may be too early for me to tell how I feel about this product. I've always had very fine wavy/straight hair, but as I've gotten older I have developed a nice curl and I have no idea how to enhance it! I tried this product because I saw on instagram that it brought out ones natural hair texture. After using this cream, my curls are so well defined and show no signs of frizz! However, it leaves my hair a little crunchy. After reading the other reviews, I think I might be using too much product. I'll keep trying!

Holy grail. I have little patience for blow drying my hair, and this makes it so I don't have to. Leaves my fairly long fine straight hair is left full of volume, body, and movement. Less is more though! I use a nickel size, any more it starts getting a little heavy.)

LOVE LOVE LOVE! My hair looks so much better air dried or blow dried and the smell is AMAZING. I have straight hair but I just it on my Grandsons hair, 3c. No frizz. No flyaways. Just perfect beautiful curls. Works well w other products
Best hair cream I've purchased! A little goes a long way and it definitely helps control the frizz, I love everything about this product even the smell is amazing!
Sometimes it seems to work nicely with my hair or sometimes not at all. However, when I mix it with leave in conditioner or even better with a mousse, the results are so much better.

I love using this product when I am rushing to go to work. It helps my hair air dry without leaving a frizz once my hair is dry. It also leaves in really soft and silky and does t have any overpowering smell to it which I appreciate.

There's a learning curve but I do like it. My hair needs more hold so I like to use a mousse after using this to keeps my waves nice and defined, but I love the hydration it gives. Great for layering.

I purchased the small size to try this, not expecting anything crazy, but I let my curls air dry and looked in the mirror and was like, woah! My hair is very long and very wavy naturally. There's no frizz, the curls are more defined and it just looks way better than it usually does. The only thing I added was this product so I'm definitely getting the large size!! Definitely worth trying I'd you have curls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't ever let my hair air dry without frizz, but with this it is smooth and defined. Tried air drying and diffusing and both work great. I don't have oily hair so this added what my hair needed.
Really does a good job at controlling my frizz and leaves hair super soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was okay.  I used it and it made my hair sticky and oily looking.  Maybe I'll try it again, maybe I didn't do it right.  I did recieve this item for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity to try this as a product tester and am here to tell you that you NEED this product! It *seriously* tamed my frizzy post-run hair in ways I didn't know were possible!  I've never been able to air dry my hair until I used this one! I get great texture that's not crunchy. Just lovely texture and wave. I comb it through my damp hair and head out the door. My hair looks like I took the time to blow dry and style. A little goes a long way and it smells great, but not over powering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine yet coarse and curly hair, and this air drying cream is amazing!! It's a bit too rich for my hair during the winter, at home in the cold.  I used it while down South for vacation, and it saved my hair. It gets super curly and unruly because of the humidity and the salt water, but with a chickpea-sized dollop, my hair behaved! It air-dryed nicely, and I could run my fingers through it, instead of my usual rat's nest of salty curls that can only get tied-up into a party bun.  This is a definite re-purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product, definitely a repurchase for me. However, I don't use it as the instructions say. I find this is a great finishing cream. It's somewhat of a jelly cream, great scent that doesn't linger. After I finish blowing out my hair I put a bit of oil on my ends, take a tiny amount of this air dry cream, rub it between my hand and apply it over my lengths. Instantly smooth hair, frizz gone, it looks so perfect. There's no left over residue, hair is soft and shiny, not weighed down at all. I was floored. I think it should also be marketed as a finishing cream cause that's where it shines. When I used it wet and let dry or styled it, it wasn't bad but prefer olaplex 6 over this. But I consider this a holy grail finishing cream. A little goes a long way, I hardly need a pea sized amount to smooth out my rib length hair. This product will last me a long time. I like that it has ingredients that improve hair health over time. Thumbs up!

reviews.review_title: Smells like a public restroom air freshener
reviews.review_text: This stuff smells so bad. It's an instant headache. My ends are like ramen and my scalp is still sticky and wet. It's yet another IG fail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: I have straight-ish asian hair. This cream lets me sleep with wet hair and not get ugly hair the next day (a consequence i usually live with bc im lazy). When I do let my hair air dry properly -- I get the uber straight hair I like, don't even need the flat iron! Gonna get a second tube the moment my current one runs out! V

reviews.review_title: I love it? Yes, I dooooo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hmmm. I love it? I have big curls and I like bounce, volume, and I like a bit of frizz TBH, and I use this with my diffuser and result are great. Has hold but isn't crunchy, it smooths but doesn't flatten, and a scent that doesn't overwhelm me. I think mini sizes are available, which is nice if you're unsure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestlyu2026. I think this is not great. At least for people with fine hair. It just makes my hair extremely slippery and frizzy and full of static. I've tried it a half dozen times with the same result.  I truly wanted to love it, but it's definitely not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much! Directions are simple- just apply a small amount and run through your hair! Let it dry and you're done! It's a thick cream so listen when it says to apply a SMALL amount! My hair is wavy, thick and extremely frizzy, and this is one of the easiest products to use to tame the frizzy mess. The product lasts all day. I did have to wash my hair again at night though because it ended looking greasy so I wouldn't recommend if you don't want to wash your hair every day. I also am not very fond of the scent of the product but I will continue to purchase this just because of how well it does with the frizz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing. I put it on before I blow dry my hair, and my hair is 1000% softer and more manageable with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Kinda bummed about this one. I heard great things about it but found it left my hair either greasy at the root or frizzy rather than wavy. It's like I couldn't find the sweet spot between too little and too much product.  severadifferent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really liking this product. I have naturally very frizzy but curly/wavy hair. This air dry cream is great. My hair is softer, less frizzy, and lets my curls shine. Light fragarance and a little bit goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I very much liked this air dry cream! I had platinum blonde hair and dyed it brown during the time I had this cream and it worked very well with my damaged hair and my newly dyed healthier hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Getting to try this clean brand has been so exciting. I received this as part of a campaign to give my honest review and it this has become a new staple in my hair care routine. I love being able to let my hair air dry with its natural curl. This has allowed me to do that and not worry about the frizz. Not to mention my hair smells amazing for days.  This will definitely be a purchase for me in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this I. Exchange for my brutal and honest opinion. Let me start by saying that I have loved Jonathan ever since I first saw them on Queer Eye. The way they transformed people hair and always always boosted their confidence was amazing. I can tell that this was a well thought out product. It is meant to be used after showering on clean wet hair that you allow to air dry. It is vegan ud83cudf31 silicone free and adds shine u2728 to your hair. Let's start out with the smell. I love anything with a hint of ud83eudd65 coconut and this product definitely transports me to a paradise ud83cudf34. I use it on semi wet hair. I usually apply it at night after my shower and use a small dime size amount. It goes a long way and leaves my hair smelling amazing, frizz free and shiny. No complaints here!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this on my daughter's frizzy, wavy hair and was unimpressed. My daughter has very frizzy, wavy, course hair that either needs to be blown out or flat ironed. She used this product when air drying her hair and her hair was just as frizzy as ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I highly recommend this product and to try out the other products in this line because they are all favorites. I even got my friends and family some of these items for Christmas since they are such great products!

It definitely gave my waves more definition and made my hair soft. I usually don't let my hair air dry often because it gets so knotty so i gave it to my boyfriend! He loves this product on his curls!! Holds the style all day and smells so good

reviews.review_text: I finally found the one!  I have NEVER found something that actually did anything for my hair that didn't make it feel it dirty or greasy.  This is the thing.  I am in love.  It smells good.  It's light.  It gives my hair volume.  It helps is hold a style.  The ingredients are vegan.  It's sulfate free.  I'm obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so happy to receive this in exchange for review. Really worked well with my texture. Not super heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not only did this not work for my thin straight hair, but this made my hair smell like the chemicals they put in porta-a-potties - so I wasn't able to use more than once. I'd do one star, but I like Jonathan Van Ness, so I did two stars.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OMG !!!  I tried them and it's honestly the best product I've ever tried. My hair is beautiful, silky and very shiny... I don't understand how I had never bought this product... it's amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really loved this product! I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion. I have really loved this. I usually air dry my hair, so this has been perfect for me. I have noticed a difference in my hair and how long it holds curl when using this product. My hair has held curls for days, even when I brush through it. I have loved it and will definitely consider purchasing this again when it's gone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have super fine hair and it doesn't feel weighed down or heavy. It just looks like I got a blow out. I do suggest using a volumnizing product if your hair is super fine like mine at the root. I definitely enjoy this product and now use it every time I wash my hair. Scent is not over powering but light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great it keeps my hair from getting frizzy after letting it air dry!

reviews.review_title: A must have on busy days !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never been able to just let my hair dry! This is a game changer! Love the smell too!  Very light!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Typically when I air dry, my hair gets frizzy. This cream keeps my hair soft and gives it a bit of smoothness. It also works well to give my fine hair texture, so I can do more with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I normally don't blow dry my hair, so this was so fun to get! I love the smell of it. I normally put in in my hair when it's still a little damp. I'll use it when I braid my hair, and when I take the braids out, my hair looks so good! Also, a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and JVN in exchange for my honest review. JVN Complete Air Dry Cream has a sparkling grapefruit and tangerine scent infused with white florals, soft violet and sweet honey notes. The product is suitable for all hair types especially frizzy, wavy, curly, or coily hair.  I personally have tried a lot of hair creams and this one is my favorite. The smell is light, keeps hair soft while maintaining moisture, and keeps the frizz away. Comes in a metal tube so be careful on how much product you squeeze out at a time. Price is reasonable if you like to pay a little more for hair products and I would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This helped reduce frizz in my hair! Living in a very humid state, frizz from humidity has been an ongoing problem. I usually like to air dry my hair to prevent any heat damage since I already have colored my hair. The scent of this cream is not too strong and it doesn't feel heavy in my hair. In addition, this gave a little bit volume in my hair which I absolutely love! I would definitely recommend other to try out this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. I shower at night so I often let it air dry overnight and this gives me an effortlessly styled look when I wake up in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, where do I start with this *~aMaZiNg~* air dry cream that is now a staple in my hair routine? Firstly, I received this product complimentary from Influenster & JVN for reviewing purposes. Now that that's out of the way, this product claims to be: made with clean hemisqualane, silicone-free, sulfate free, color-safe, and vegan. I believe all those claims to be true because I've never had a hair product thoroughly impress and amaze me thus faru2026 I use this product on freshly shampooed/conditioned hair that's been somewhat towel dried; I've used it alone and with other high end productsu2026 Bottom line, this product has transformed my normally frizzy, somewhat wavy hair to a curly frizz-free dream. I've never had a hair product just wow me like this, it leaves my hair literally flawless, curly, shiny, healthy, everything I could want in one singular product. I will say, I follow up with hair spray, but otherwise, this product alone has transformed my hair and the first day I used it I got so many compliments from my coworkers about my hair. Go out and buy it at Sephora because if you're not amazed, they have a great return policy. Which, I doubt will be the case, but I can't say enough great things about this air dry cream. It's a miracle product for people with in between hair and will ultimately get your hair right. A little goes a long way and at this price point, it's worth every penny. Thanks JVN, this product is one of my holy grails! ud83eudef6ud83cudffb

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing but also is super light weight, hydrating and smoothing. On the days I let my hair be in it's natural form a few drops of Jvn air dry cream makes my usually frizzy hair smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually let my hair air dry almost everytime after I wash it, but never had any product to use until I was able to try this! I absolutely love it for my hair. My hair normally would dry and be frizzy and this has completely changed the game for me. Excited to try out more products from JVN!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

I had to play around to find the right amount - it turns out I was actually using too little of the product at first.  I will definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin

It's hard to get the product when it's almost out. Other than that, I'm pretty happy with the result I'm getting. reviews.review_text: I love this product. The smell is great and it makes my hair feel soft and shiny. I have extensions and it works great on them. Most of the time I like to let my hair air dry to protect the longevity of my  extensions and this product is great for that. My natural hair is very fine so I think this product would be too heavy for my natural hair. I would absolutely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I never knew this kind of product was even on the market. I also never knew I needed it!  I got this cream in the small size in the JVN package with the serum pot and pre-wash hair oil. I absolutely LOVE this stuff. I always air dry my hair (unless I have an event to go, then I have to heat style). I usually shower at night and just apply hair oil on my ends but I find that I wake up with my hair still damp. Believe me when I say this cream is a game changer! JVN's Air Dry Cream definitely cuts down on drying time. It has brought back my natural texture and enhanced the waves I had lost due to constant chemical processing/dying/heat styling in the past. The scent is divine and very luxe, fresh and pretty - it's not too strong but definitely lingers. The JVN Air Dry cream makes my hair so incredibly soft and shiny. My hair is shoulder length and thin but I have lots of hair and I don't need much more than a nickel sized amount of product to spread from root to ends. It detangles and feels like a protective glove. It gives a bit of body and prevents a whole lot of frizz from happening. It never makes my hair greasy and doesn't leave a waxy residue. I am in LOVE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products for free from influester and JVN in exchange for my honest review.  I received the Air Dry Cream and the Blow Out Styling Milk this review pertains to the JVN Air Dry Cream  hair type - heavy, wavy, thick, black, staticky   PROS -   - wow first application, noticed the difference.  - small amount is enough for my entire ton of hair - it smells AMAZING - musk and floral scent - once dry, my hair was wavy and static free!!!  - shinnier hair - easier to style - does not lead to greasy hair, just make sure to apply from crown to roots - OH and i did try it on dry hair and it did not leave it greasy!!!  CONS  -the cream comes in a those metal tubes and i truly HATED that as those tend to tear and are harder to get the last of the product left.  regardless, that is something im willing to overlook, I LOVED IT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complete Hydrating Air Dry Hair Cream is a perfect addition to my hair care routine. 90 percent of the time, I let my hair air dry to prevent additional heat damage. I have tried several air dry products from various brands and this is my new FAVORITE.   I applied a dime size amount of this product on wet hair, combed it through, and  let it air dry. The end result was smoother hair that still had volume and could be styled. The scent of the product is light and enjoyable. Will definitely be purchasing in the future!

reviews.review_text: I really really wanted to love it. I almost always air dry my hair now that is post covid thin and waves have lost their definition. reviews.review_title: Great styling product that saves time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product along with a styling milk for testing purposes from Influenster. I used this after washing and let my hair air dry. It helped keep my wavy hair smooth and soft and smelled great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was very pleased at the results after using the air dry cream.  It left my hair very silky and soft. I put my hair up in a tight bun and my curls were so soft and shiny.  I highly recommend the air fry cream for those days you don't blow dry your hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received both the air dry cream and blow out milk from influenster and JVN for free to test out and review.  Okay, so I am still unsure how I feel about them.  The air dry cream leaves my curls soft and really tamed the frizziness a lot. If you use the cream the way you are actually supposed to for curly hair ignoring the direction completely then it works great. What I mean by using it the right way is applying the product to your sopping wet hair right before exiting the shower. This is the correct way to apply curly products to curly hair. If you follow the directions then you end up with a floofy frizzy mess that looks greasy and dirty. If used correctly your curls and waves look hydrated and soft. This cream goes a long way and too much will weigh down your curls so find the right amount for you. I have not tried to diffuse with my hair at all with this as I try not to use heat when wearing my hair natural.  For the blow out milk I have only really used this a handful of times as I don't dry my hair often. The days I did blow dry my hair though, I applied the milk after squeezing most the water out of my hair. Then I blue dried my hair in sections with my large barrel brush. This left my hair feeling smooth and shiny without the weight. I also used a tiny bit on my hands for any flyaways. The packaging is nice as well. The air dry cream comes in an aluminum tube and cardboard box. They say recyclable.  The milk comes in a nice glass bottle and cardboard box. They are reasonably affordable as a treat. They are both under $28 and actually on sale right now for $20. They are above my normal budget but they would make a nice every now and then pamper product. The thing I love the most about the products is that they are a cruelty free brand and I would feel comfortable purchasing after they are gone.  All in all I would recommend if you are looking for something new.

reviews.review_text: Hi! After using this product for a few days now. I like the softness of my hair and how manageable it becomes. My hair usually tangles up because i have so much hair.  continue to use this product.

reviews.review_text: this product works so well on my hair! i use a super small amount and work through my hair and air dry as usual. my hair fry's super soft and luxurious. the only thing i didn't like was i felt like i had to wash their two days sooner than usual each time i use it but i don't mind! i love it and the size bottle it is in will last forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this stuff. It gives me the perfect amount of hold and is an easy way to do a quick, air-dry wavy style.

reviews.review_text: this product give ur hair a natural shine without making it oily. it can be used on dry or wet hair. it minimizes frizz and flyaway while giving ur hair lots of texture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't too impressed with this air dry creme. It left my hair feeling heavy with product and the texture was very brittle. I would think before buying this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from #Influenster  in a #voxbox in exchange for my honest opinion. First smell test...it smells amazing its warm feeling and reminds me of what my hair smells like after going to the salon. It has a nice hold and is easy to style. A little goes a very long way. Over all I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: after using this air dry cream on my hair a few times the past few weeks I'm really happy with it. it has a nice light scent and after my hair air dries I feel.like this helps being out my natural hair texture. I would recommend keeping it away from your roots if they tend to be oily. a little if this goes a long way too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a nice product that I got through Influenster in exchange for an honest review . It had a light scent to it, easy to apply and made my hair feel nice. However, it didn't really help u201cstyleu201d my hair in any way, nor did it dry any differently than usual. I liked it but probably not enough to repurchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The JVN air dry cream smells good and does make my hair smooth on a low humid day. It's not a heavy product and doesn't weigh it down. It doesn't leave my hair oily. I don't find it worked as great for the frizz, but living in Louisiana the humidity is really bad. I used it for air drying my hair and after blow drying and didn't notice much of a difference when styling it. I received this product as a complimentary gift from Influentster in exchange for my honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the JVN Complete Hydrating Air Dry Hair Cream. It does a decent job of keeping my light waves frizz free. I had my son try this cream because he has shorter and curlier hair than I do. I also like the way my hair turns out when using a diffuser and thr hair dryer with this cream. While this cream doesn't  deliver a big shine or feel greasy, it is buildable and is made with clean hemisqualine, is silicone free,sulfate free, is colors safe, and is vegan. It keeps his curls in tact and is light weight. If you like a scented product, then you may like the scent of this cream. The scent smells so nice and is a very fresh and clean scent. I would recommend this cream to anyone who has 2 b or 3 b hair. I don't really know how other  hair textures compare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a fan of the Air Dry Cream. It weighs my hair down way too much. Even just using a small amount it made my hair super greasy. #JVNHair #JVNGifted #complimentary @JVNHair @Influenster I recieved these products for free from Influenster and JVN Hair in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the smell of this and that it has light hold! I don't like using gel because of the crunchy feel this did not have that feel at all. My only issue it seems this leaves a build up if you get it on your scalp in the least little bit. Long as I avoid the root area I'm good I dobt have any scalp build up! Oh i also love the packaging feels very professional instead of cheap!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from influenster in exchange for my honest opinion.  It works ok but I didn't like the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this air dry cream and will definitely be adding it to my haircare routine.  This cream is very light, smells fresh but not overwhelming,  and I've the touchable hold-you can still brush through and isn't crunchy. The cream also takes away the frizz,  love, love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have almost waist length curly hair that tangles easily. After washing and conditioning I apply this, detangle, scrunch my curls and go. It seems to melt the tangles right out of my hair. This cream helps my hair dry way faster than without it, and frizz stays away! Very light hold for shape, applied heavier gets a crunch that needs to be scrunched.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the scent and feel of the product, though it felt more like a serum. The packaging wasn't the best for the product. I felt like my hair felt dry and crunchy after using this.

reviews.review_title: New staple added to the routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is never manageable when I get out of the shower. The curls never sit right and it's always frizzy! But this actually keeps my curls sitting better and not break away into frizz. I did use it in combination with some other products, like anti frizz cream and oils, to really enhance it. I literally use this every time I shower and every morning before work because I have no time to spend on doing my hair. No strong overpowering smell, and it has a great texture. And doesn't leave your hair crunchy! Absolutely will be buying again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved my free sample of this air dry cream. I haven't used air dry cream for awhile and I had forgotten how much it helps. I am very low maintenance so this cream makes it very easy to smooth my hair and give it a bit of a more polished look with little effort. If I twist my hair in a clip it creates nice waves later when I take it down. I would highly recommend this product and will likely buy more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This helped eliminate my frizz easily! It held my curls pretty decently and it smells good. I think this does what it says pretty well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finally used this product. The air dry cream smells good. It helped me with the frizz which is good and it maintains my curls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I air dry my hair just about daily and I love this.   It tames my fly aways.  It can make your hair appear oily; which is unfortunate.   I would highly recommend.

reviews.review_text: I've been using the mini size and I like it a lot! I run it through damp hair and scrunch, and it gives my shaggy cut volume and texture. I have naturally straight hair and I get beach waves. Lightweight and smells good

reviews.review_text: It helped tame my flyaways when I would do slick-backed looks or help keep my shorter hairs in place. Besides that, I wasn't really sure what to use it for. That's the only thing I've seen it used to do

reviews.review_text: I loved this product! My hair normally gets very frizzy when I air dry it even when using a frizz cream but I had no problem with this. My hair also easily gets greasy from products and I had no issues with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved the product through influencer. I love the packaging. It looks very nice. I like the smell of the product. It did help my hair with managing the frizz. It did also help hold my curl after I blow dried it I curbed it and it lasted all day. I would purchase again. It was easy to apply. Little goes a long way! Smells amazing and is super light. It didn't make my hair look greasy and controlled the frizz, but it didn't hold my curls very well.

reviews.review_text: I love this. The smell is great. I always air dry my hair and this left my hair feeling soft and less frizzy. I have curly hair so Lea's frizz is what I usually aim for and this helped at lot! I received this free from Influenster for my honest Review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, my hair feels so good and healthy, the products has a really good texture and it doesn't small bad and my curly hair had a glow up,  I really recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: Not a go to for frizzy hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very frizzy hair and I needed a hair cream and a styling protecter that would give my hair hydration so it doesn't look dull. I got recommended this hair cream but it just made my hair still feel dull. Even when I styled my hair with the blowdryer, it didn't make my hair feel soft so for those two reasons I would say this product is a pass for frizzy hair. The only pros I can say is that it makes your hair smell fresh and the bottle size will last you a long time to actually finish. Yet again, always try the product yourself to see if it works for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate blow drying my hair and almost always air dry and this is an amazing product to help tame frizz and define my waves while allowing it to air dry. The first time I used it I must have used a little too much and made my hair a little crunchy so the next time I used it I started with a smaller amount and added a little more as I went. (Just chopped my hair off and used to using more product.) I will definitely purchase this to keep on hand in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'll be honest, I'm pretty loyal to my Living Proof smoothing cream. It keeps my usually fluffy, unruly hair somewhat manageable. This JVN Air Dry Cream is fantastic, too, at making my hair smooth and frizz-free, plus it's cheaper than my Living Proof go-to! I love the toothpaste tube packaging, it feels luxurious and kind of reminds me of Aesop packaging (which I love). Can't wait to try other JVN hair solutions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample to try from Influenster. I truly enjoyed this cream. I felt like it made my hair silky smooth and gave it an extra umph when it was blown out. I will continue using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this both by air drying and using a diffuser and I find that using a diffuser is the way to go for my hair. When my hair air dried, it didn't really curl and was kind of flat and lifeless. When I diffused it, it was full of life and curls and I was blown away! And the scentu2026so beautiful! It smells like a flower garden that I never want to leave! I will definitely be purchasing this again!

reviews.review_title: Brought My Hair Back To Life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works amazing! Not sticky and a little goes a long way! This tube going to last me a good while. I have really coarse hair and using this brings it back to life! I'm getting moisture, shine and volume that it's been lacking! Helped with frizz too! Easy to get beachy waves or hold styles! I love how my hair looks using this creme!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately nothing about this product is holy grail for me. Yes, it is light, leaves your hair soft, however it didn't do anything better than the other products that I normally use. My hair was a bit lackluster after use and it has a very generic smell (I've used other products that smell exactly like this). Overall it does what it says, but I wasn't wowed by my results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this air dry cream! It is great for helping control frizz. My hair is fine and thin and this helps give it some texture when I air dry. I sometimes just blow dry my roots and use this cream to help accentuate my natural waves. This product has the best scent hands down! I would repurchase this product. I already picked up a travel size to keep in my luggage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have enjoyed using this product as a mom going through postpartum hair loss. I've had to refrain from using the blow dryer to dry my hair but my hair would end up so frizzy from air drying. With this leave in cream it helps combat the frizz while my hair air dries! It smells good and is a very fair price.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for my curls and frizz
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After testing this out and receiving from Influenster, I really loved how this product helped styling after wash day and helped control frizz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This air dry cream is described as A frizz-fighting soft styling cream for buildable, touchable hold that lets your natural texture shine. I love how this cream is made specifically for air drying your hair! Normally when I air dry my hair, even with a leave in conditioner, my hair is left very frizzy but with this air dry cream my hair is definitely not as frizzy and looks healthier and shinier as well! I especially love it being a new mom for when I don't have time to blow dry my hair I can apply this air dry cream and I will have a good hair day! This air dry cream is described as A frizz-fighting soft styling cream for buildable, touchable hold that lets your natural texture shine. I love how this cream is made specifically for air drying your hair! Normally when I air dry my hair, even with a leave in conditioner, my hair is left very frizzy but with this air dry cream my hair is definitely not as frizzy and looks healthier and shinier as well! I especially love it being a new mom for when I don't have time to blow dry my hair I can apply this air dry cream and I will have a good hair day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Worked absolutely incredibly for me, my hair has never been curlier or more defined. Every time I air dry my hair I'm completely floored, I honestly had no idea my hair could look this good. I've thought that I had like kind of uneven, frizzy waves for most of my adult life but it turns out if I use the right products and styling tools my texture is completely different. I've used other similar products but this one has by far the best results, not even close.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample and have been using it consistently. I like the metal tube packaging, easy to squeeze and feels steady and luxurious. The texture of the cream is light and not sticky. Not greasy. I like it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best hair product I've ever used hands down! Soft and shiny hair with great volume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cream. It makes my hair feel so soft without weighing it down. The cream itself is silky and not oily at all. Also, I love the scent. It smells like I just walked out of the salon every time I use it. And I love that it's a sulfate free product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. I received it as a free sample from Influenster, and was excited to try it! From the first time I used it, I knew it would be a new staple in my hair routine. I have fine hair that tends to frizz, but adding air dry cream quickly controls the frizz without needing to heat style. Easily saves me 20 minutes of styling, and the smoothing, anti-frizz effects last several days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had a baby and was having such a hard time knowing what to do with my hair since I barely had enough time to shower let alone stole my hair. I started using this product and fell in love with it! It smells amazing but not too strong and when I put it in my damp hair it drys beautifully and actually looks styled. I've received so many compliments on my hair since using it and will continue to use this product. I highly recommend for anyone who doesn't have the time or desire to do their hair but still wants it to look presentable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first pic is with the air dry cream, the last one is a picture of me when I didn't use the cream. From what I could tell in my few times using it, there are pros and cons. A major pro is that is definitely helps with the frizz and smoothes hair. One of the cons is that I feel like it makes my hair less wavy and more straight, so I end up with in between straight and wavy hair. But, maybe I just need to find something else to use in combination with it. All in all, I would say it's a pretty good product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff works well! Most of my hair fell out after being hospitalized twice (It's called telogen effluviumu2026) Well, what grew back is thick curly hair! I've never had hair this curly.. (not even with the awful spiral perms of the 80's) and so this product arriving on my doorstep was a Godsend! My hair went from a solid 2a to a 3b and I needed help! This product moisturizes, smoothes my new frizzy locks, and let my curls shine through  while keeping them in place! It smells good and is light and buildable for whss as ru00eaver level hold I want!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free from influenster in exchange for my honest opinion.   I have curly dry and frizzy hair and I always air dry unless I straighten my hair and this cream its really good its smells incredible and my curls dry very cute i definitely recommend giving the cream a try.  Very nice product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the air dry cream!! Smelled good, wasn't too thick like didn't make my hair stiff/sticky, seemed like it dried a little quicker, less frizz, styled good this morning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This air dry cream has my curls thanking me! This cream is a the last step in my hair care routine. This truly gives me lasting, bouncy, shiny and defined curls. An effortless look that seems like I took forever styling my hair but didn't! This cream is a bit on the thicker side but does not weigh your hair down, no greasy feel or sticky feel in your hair. It doesn't leave a waxy film or make your hair feel dry. Just soft to the touch, yet a defined every day look that's perfect for curly or wavy hair. Even on straight hair this would work well to cut down on the frizz and fly aways for an easy wash, go and out the door. The scent is nice and clean, which I adore. This product lasts in my hair untill my next wash, which is about every 2-3 days. I really love that this isn't made with silicones, which just coat the hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This stuff works so well. My hair drys naturally wavy but with frizz. This product took that frizz right out. Perfect for a lazy hair day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes, and I really enjoyed this cream. It does help to tame frizz. Overall, it gives a very smooth look and doesn't weigh my hair down. Smells nice, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Who is that , taking over the world from one scalp to the next , gossip girl here to report that this is THE NEW IT GIRL for all the girlies ! I loved this product so much that I want to try out the whole line of products , it gives me such an effortless look to my natural curls I like to put it right after the shower and sleep on it it smells amazing and gives amazing results will be buying this forever please bury me with it lol !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the air dry cream from Influenster and I will definitely be adding it to my normal hair routine. The cream allows my hair to air dry without becoming frizzy. It has a light, clean, scent. The only downside is my hair is kind of crunchy after applying once it dries!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Dry skin

It also leaves my hair smoother with less frizz. I just don't love the scent but it doesn't linger. I received this product free for my honest review from Influenster & JVN.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: other than minimizing frizz it didn't really do a whole lot for meu2026 (incentivized)

reviews.review_title: Become one my fave list for hair product

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!

reviews.review_text: After using this product my hair looks and smells like I have just left the salon. It smells very good and is lightweight. I feel like it helps protect my hair against heat and also keeps my fly away tamed.

reviews.review_text: I love this Complete Hydrating Air Dry Hair Cream by JVN! The scent is perfect and it doesn't weigh my hair down. No crunch and no weird residue feeling. I'm so excited for the chance to try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have super fine hair. This doesn't weigh it down at all, and it doesn't leave my hair crunchy either! Very light scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product! It definitely helps reduce the frizz that I get from air drying typically. I only wish it helped my curls, they're a little flat with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't like how crunchy this made my hairu2026I also don't like how it still requires styling when it's marketed as a air dry product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is marketed as a air dry cream to enhance your natural texture, for both straight and curly hair. I would say this works way better with curly hair. It does have a bit of a hold so there is a slight like very slight crunchiness but it goes away if you just gently rub your hands over the hair. I wouldn't recommend for straight hair clients as a shine or moisture cream since it seems to enhance curls better. I am a hairstylist and I have used this on clients. The ones with fine hair I used it as a conditioner and did a quick rinse so it didn't make their hair too heavy and it still gave their curls a nice hold! A little goes a long way with this. The smell is nice and can be used for male or females. The price to me seems extreme reasonable compared to similar products. I would recommend this to curly hair people and would purchase it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product once because I usually blow-dry my hair. this product kept true to my original hair but my hair is straight on the outside but has a wave on the inside toward the top of the hair, my hair was less frizzy when I used this product.  I received this product as a free sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I am a hairdresser and despise blow drying my hair. This product gives me silky smooth hair without all the hard work!

reviews.review_text: After using this product for a couple of weeks, I did notice the ease of truly being able to wash and go.  My hair is prone to be frizzy and by using this product, I can air dry my hair and not worry about looking like a hot mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Love this product. It smells great. It doesn't leave a film or sticky feeling on my hair. Washed it at night, applied cream, woke up with beautiful waves!

Upon my initial use of it, I noticed a drastic reduction in frizz and my hair was a lot softer however my hair was a little more flat compared to usual. This is very likely due to user error though. Please see my before and after below for comparison.

reviews.review_text: I received these product(s) for free from Influenster and JVN Hair in exchange for my honest review.   First! Let me tell you I do not know how I survived without these products. They changed my whole life (and here I thought that was coffee that did that.) In just 2 short weeks my hair completely transformed from a frizzy mess to sleek, shine, volume, AND my curls even loved the products. I will definitely add that a little bit goes a long ways, and they work with any hair type that I myself personally tried. Both products are extremely lightweight, versatile, and too top it off keep my hair balanced. Originated with clean ingredients and an interesting blend in the formula such as:                                       Airdry creme: (not heat activated)     HEMISQUALANE-Improves hair health and strength instantly and over time. Smoothes, strengthens, protects color and reduces damage. CHIA SEED AND LINSEED EXTRACT- Natural texture enhancer that lends touchable hold MORINGA SEED OIL- Adds softness, shine and luster.                                                 Combine all of this together and JVN created a lightly scented product, and the results last! I simply cannot go a single day without these babies in my routine.  Go for it! You won't regret it!  #JVNHair #JVNGifted #complimentary

reviews.review_title: Love this product for my hair, worth the price!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to try this hair cream on my hair today to see if it really would make my hair more manageable, so after my shower which I chose not to wash my hair today; I have to say I seriously love this JVN Air Dry Cream, it made my hair feel soft and my hair didn't get frizzy or stiff like most of the products I try or use. The cream felt a little watery when I put some in my hands but it really did the job once I got it worked into my hair, I didn't have to add more for my hair. I like the scent, but I wish it had more a somewhat sweet scent to it. I thought smelled like some of the more expensive salons. This will have to be 1 of my hair staples! Even in the afternoon my hair still felt soft and looked good. I recommend this product to for everyone, but especially for those who don't like using blow-dryers and straighteners on their hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 1. The smell is so amazing and refreshing! This air dry cream has a great texture/consistency. Would recommend for wavy to curly hair. Not to hard but not too soft has a nice hold. Plus it's vegan, color safe, & sulfate & silicon free!!

reviews.review_title: Will incorporate into my routine going forward!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So excited to receive this!! The air dry creme is a dream; helps even my stick straight strands hold a curl and smells amazing! I add the cream to towel dried hair at night and then put up in a loose bun for sleep. I wake up to beautiful soft waves.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super light product and helps maintain the frizz. Packaging is nice and makes it easy to get all your product out. Will be using again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: With this styling cream my frizz has drastically reduced, and my hair looks healthy, the texture is not sticky, nor heavy and nor does it leave any residue, it gives my color treated hair softness, definition, shine and it smells amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: There are many things I adore about this product: The branding/packaging feels upscale to me, the designs and textures make this part of my routine feel luxe. The smell of the product is a very neutral smell but also smells so good! I appreciate the need for a product like this for people like myself who are more low maintenance with their hair. The ingredients are all clean and the face behind the products are knowledgeable in the hair space which gives me peace of mind!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made my hair crunchy and frizzy? The opposite of what it was supposed to do. There are way better products out there imo.

reviews.review_text: I've used this product for about a week now, and it is already my new favorite hair product! It has eliminated frizz from my hair, and has made it so smooth and shiny!

reviews.review_text: This stuff smells amazing, makes my hair look amazing, and doesn't add any weird sticky or crunchiness to my hair! My hair is naturally pretty straight with a slight wave and this defined that slight wave and gave my hair beautiful body to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all the packaging is flawless! It is so easy to get out! As a mom of 2 I rarely have time to dry my hair, this product helped my hair dry less frizzy, more shiny and more smooth! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried using this products for the first time but noticed the changes right away. I like air drying my hair on its own from after every shower. The complete air dry cream was definitely a catch coz it works absolutely great on frizziness and feels soft on my hair when it dries totally. The blowout styling milk is a must have. It keeps the style on my hair for longer hours and it smells really good too. Less frizz and color safe! Yay love these! Recommended to others for sure

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice! Makes your hair so smooth and soft when air dried. Also tried it on dry hair and it immediately de-frizzed and softened my hair. Excited to keep using it!

reviews.review_title: A Salon Experience in a Bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a great first experience with this product. I have 4c hair that I like to put in braids to air dry. The first thing I noticed was the beautiful eco friendly packaging. The cream is fairly lightweight and water based. It has an amazing fresh out of the salon smell that lingers just enough. It feels like a self care treat while you dry your hair The only thing I wished for was more hold. But maybe if you are a type 2 or 3 you would have better results. If JVN offered a styler with more hold I would love it to work in combination to the cream which I found very hydrating and reduced frizz.

reviews.review_title: Absolute must have for my long wavy mane!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have waist length wavy hair (about a 2b) and I don't like to blow dry or use lots of products in my hair. I generally air dry, but my hair can get a bit frizzy. This air dry cream from JVN has really helped my hair look smoother, shinier, and healthier in general without weighing it down as most styling products do. The cream is light, not greasey, and smells FANTASTIC!   It is a clean, feminine, but not too strong scent. The scent is my favorite thing about this product, it lingers all day and can still be smelled 12+ hours after applying. I really like this product and recommend it to everyone that prefers air drying over blowouts. Your hair will thank you!  I'm amazed by the amount of people giving poor reviews just because they normally blow dry. This is literally for air drying. If your hair is a mess without blow drying, this product is not for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine thin hair so maybe this product is not made for my hair but it felt sticky and my hair did not air dry well. In the end I pulled out my dryer to clean it up. I do love the brands styling milk though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start off by saying this product is not for me, my hairstyle, or hair texture. I have a short pixie cut, bleached color, and fine wavy hair. This product is geared towards people who air dry their hair, which I do not do. I did try using this product and let my hair air dry, but had not great results. My hair was very fuzzy, it worked against my waves, and I felt like I needed to use a ton to control the end results. I used this product on wet hair and styled my hair with a round brush like I usually do and also had odd results. It made my hair feel thick and unmanageable. The more i kept trying to smooth out my hair with the round brush, the tougher it became. It was almost difficult to run my fingers through after this method. I couldn't wait to wash it out. The final way I used this was as a finishing cream after my usual styling. It was fine, but didnt impress me enough to have me reach for this over my usual products. It's great that you get so much product and the price is very reasonable, but this is just not fot me. The scent reminds me of biolage products and has an earthiness to it. Overall this is very underwhelming for me. I think for someone who does not heavily process their hair and styles their hair by air drying it, this would be way more successful. This is a big no for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so surprised with how amazing this product is! My hair was super curly and smooth the next day after braiding it and using this product. Really adds a nice hold and volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product completely did wonders for my waves and smelled wonderful! My waves were less frizzy and more defined :)

It's more like a cream that goes on super easy and then dries and softly molds your hair. I really like this product as it doesn't weigh my long heavy hair down anymore than it already is. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: this product is a must have!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was introduced to this brand through the influenster program, they sent this to me to try for free in exchange for an authentic review. I am a hairstylist who uses a lot of great products everyday and I love to air dry my own hair cause it's super wavy and dries nicely with the right kind of air dry product or texture spray. I had no expectations because I had never heard anything about the brand, the packaging is really modern and nice and the air dry cream is packaged in a similar way to a tube of hair color just much bigger, It's a good size tube of product and you truly don't need a lot of product at all it's concentrated. I am a tough critic and I don't judge lightly when it comes to hair products, and instantly I could tell this was a great product that was well formulated and had an intentional styling purpose, from this day forward this is my holy grail product for my hair, it did everything I wanted it to do and more. I have coarse hair, very dry looking when I blow dry, my mother says it looks like hay which I get offended about but it truly does, it's just super thick and coarse and has always felt dehydrated. Typically when I air dry I do my hair soaking wet, and apply a ton of different products for different reasons, one to hydrate, one to defrizz, one for control and one for enhancing my wave pattern. This product is genius, I don't know if any other product I have ever tried on myself that has suited my hair type so perfectly. My hair dried without frizz, and it gave me beautiful texture and perfectly beachy waves without feeling like I had anything in my hair at all. it left my hair feeling soft and hydrated and also with a great style and volume at the roots. I'm so impressed and I'm so intrigued to learn about the rest of this line and use it on my clients. This is the best for hair like mine, I love it. Who doesn't want beautiful waves and low maintenance styling without any heat damage? Try it

reviews.review_title: Leaves hair so soft and healthy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use the air dry cream as a finisher after styling and it leaves my hair super soft. I can't recommend enough ud83eudd70ud83eudd70

It smellsnice and all but if anything when my hair dried it looked dull and worse than if I had put nothing in it at all. It did help my hair dry quickly though.

reviews.review_text: This is a great product if you want smooth, straight hair. My hair looks & feels healthy. But I prefer more volume in my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love that JVN created this air dry cream that can be used by so many textures and curl patterns. The scent of this is subtle but reminds me of products typically used in a salon and has that salon scent to it in a good way. It's not overpowering and doesn't irritate me at all. I also love that the cream is a true cream, it is not too watery nor is it too sticky it has a wonderful consistency that makes applying it very easy without leaving a ton of residue on your hands afterwards. I have 3b/3C hair and I think that this is a good back-up product to my current system but at times I feel like if I layer it, it leaves too much residue and I don't like when it dries but I do use this at times when I know I will be applying heat in the future just so there is some moisture / primer on my hair at all times. There are times where I feel like my hair kind of soaks this product up to the point where it can get brittle so I have to be conscious about rotating my moisture / protein products but I think that's mostly due to my hair type and texture and not to do with the product. I would absolutely purchase this again and think it's a good product to have in my normal curly hair routine rotation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! It's very nourishing and clean feeling. The consistency is nice and enriching. Smells delicious and I loved my natural curls that resulted from it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hair product! It is the only thing that helps keep my hair from getting frizzy.

Needless to say it made drying my hair take much longer and my hair look greasy afterwards. I would skip this product. Not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this product. A friend recommended it and it has been so worth it! I've noticed that every time I use it, my hair still has the perfect moisturized-yet-bouncy texture for days afterward without the feeling of nasty product build-up. Sort of like what I wish dry shampoo could do for me, but never does because it always just dries out my roots and makes my hair feel gross. The Air Dry Creme also helps me steer clear of over-washing my hair, which, knowing JVN from Queer Eye, I know was probably important to them! I also appreciate the fact that the bottle is not made of plastic and the ingredients are clean. Would recommend 100%!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it took me a while to figure out how to use this cream best because it tended to feel like it was drying out my hair when used after a shower. You really only need a tiny bit of it (too much makes it feel dry) and it works best over some kind of leave in conditioner spray and then under a little of the Recovery Serum to help soften and smooth your ends. This cream helps give texture and emphasize what you already have but it's not going to give slip so you need to use something for that as well if you have dry hair.  I do really love it after I understood the best way to use it. it makes my natural texture look so good, my hair has volume and light hold/pliability and it always dries really nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this!  I've grown out my hair lately, but I hate blow drying it so this stuff is a minor miracle!  Leaves my hair smooth and looking good.  Only con I've noticed is that my fine hair seems to take longer to dry.  Will be buying many more tubes of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is fine/super low porosity around the 2b-2c scale and this cream is just not it. It makes it super stringy and look like ramen noodles (curly girls you know what I mean), to the point that numerous people have asked if I got a perm.  Really hate it, wish it was cheaper so I could stop using it but at that price I'm committed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product, hate the packaging. My hair looks FANTASTIC and it gives me nice waves and texture that I never knew I had, and it smells great to boot. I don't feel like I have ever applied 'too much', like i have with other air dry products that I can accidentally overuse and makes my hair greasy. This is always just right.  The tube, however, its metal and has broken open at the creases, oozing out product. I see dollar signs drying up as I watch it leak out. I plan on moving it into a travel squeezy tube.

reviews.review_title: I was skeptical but love it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: All the frizz control with no crunchy feeling

This stuff, however, makes my hair so soft to the touch and frizz-free. I put it on right after the shower when my hair is still pretty wet, and it holds down the frizz all day! When I feel like I need a little touch up, i.e. the next day, I'll throw on some of JVN's hair oil or conditioning mist to refresh my curls. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_text: Love this air dry cream. I love that it's not heavy at all and the smell is delicious! My fiance always says u201cyour hair smells amazingu201d everytime I used this product lol
I never use hair products and let my thick hair air dry. It's never looked better!

reviews.review_title: finally something for us curly, dry, thick haired
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product gives my dry, curly, thick hair that no-product hairstyle I've been after all my life. Works better when I have my hair short though. Only downfall to my long hair is that I'll use more and finish this quickly, so I only wish they would come with a value size for the people that *actually* need to get that good good from this product. The smell is nice. Like a fresh soapy like smell. The texture is pretty nice. Not runny and not stiff. Keeps its place in your palm without sliding off when you're putting the cap back on the tube. Am definitely purchasing this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm sad because I wanted to like this but it doesn't seem to do anything for my hair. It actually makes my hair a little sticky if I use any more than like a dime size of it (I do have a bob though). Might help a little with shine but I really can't even tell.

reviews.review_title: It's a definite no for me
