reviews.review_text: The only reason this deserves 1 star is for the value... you get a decent amount of product for the price. Sadly, everything else about it was awful. No matter how little product you use, it leaves a filmy, sticky residue behind, and it did nothing to tame my frizz or hydrate my hair. In fact, it left my hair feeling even drier. I had high hopes for this cream, because I love letting my hair air dry in the summer, but I definitely can't recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan. AT ALL. I hate the packaging of the hard tin? It feels very sticky and does not help my hair at all by any means. My hair feels hard like after you get out of the pool. It doesn't even smell good.

reviews.review_title: For people who don't normally use hair products.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am pretty neurotic about caring for my long, thick hair. Very little product. Very little heat styling. I decided to trust JVN Air Dry and I'm glad I did! The packaging is perfect. Large tube of product, of which you need very little to have bouncy, shiny hair. A few different people in my life stopped me to compliment my hair the first time I used it! And the effects were still pretty poppin until my next wash a few days later. I may be a lifetime devotee.

reviews.review_title: I will never stop buying this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got thin hair? This product made me feel so much better about my hair. It felt thicker, shinier and even had that post wash feeling like you get at the salon. Huge fan. Love. Big love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is super amazing! I used this to do my wash and go styles, it had my curls looking super cute and light. I really love this product and would recommend to anyone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent was nice I'm not as obsessed as I am with the serum but it's not heavy and did not trigger my husband's migraines which is a plus for me! I used this on myself who has very straight hair and my daughter who has curly hair and it worked really well with our completely different hair textures! My daughter's curls looked amazing after I used this product. It's great to have a product that everyone in the house can use! Usually the sink is divided between straight hair and curly hair products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hair cream. It leaves my hair feeling soft and touchable. I love the tousled look it gives me with no frizz. Amazing def recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. This product made my hair feel super soft and shiny while reducing frizz. I always air dry my hair and have been using this product for weeks as part of my hair care routine. I plan on continuing to use it and will definitely be purchasing it once I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster and JVN in exchange for my honest review.  Highly recommend this one! I typically have a very small amount of time to do anything with my hair. This product allows me to quickly style without being all clumpy or greasy, and lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free from Influenster to test. I love it. I got the set of the mask and air dry cream and they work great together and separate. This one is very versatile. I use it on damp hair, then on my ends after my hair is dry. It makes it shiny and soft. And it smells really goid

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like both creams very much. They work really well on my semi curly hair and smell really good. Don't know if these will be staples in my routine yet but we shall see.

reviews.review_title: Has improved overall condition of my hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had never heard of or used an air dry cream before, but I am loving this one by JVN! I have long, wavy hair, but it's fine to medium in texture; my wave never usually lasts, and styling products typically weigh it down. Not this one! My waves last for at least a couple days and I can simply reactivate the product by spritzing with a bit of water and scrunching. I tend to get oily at the roots rather quickly, and drier near the middle to ends; but I can go longer without shampooing or using dry shampoo, and my ends feel SO SOFT. The overall condition of my hair has improved, as well. Has a light, clean, earthy scent with a bit of hold. Not sticky or crunchy at all. I love that it is vegan and ultra hydrating without being overly thick or greasy. Less is more to start out with, as it is completely buildable. The first selfie is with only the cream; the second is with the cream and having my hair in a claw clip for 2 hrs. I have received multiple compliments on my hair since incorporating this into my routine. I am completely sold on this and want to try more JVN products. Would absolutely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the fact that it was a clean and vegan product! No silicone, sulfates, and it's color safe! Using this to amp up my air dry routine with my curls really helped with frizz and bringing natural shine and flow back to my hair (which I'd dried out from dying ) I learned a little goes a long way for this product and didn't leave a weird greasy or sticky texture when using less. Also using too much weighed down my curls, I have fine hair, but using less and combing it through my hair did wonders.  It also protects your hair from heat damage so on the days I wanted to use the diffuser in my hair I had confidence knowing it was protected!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the JVN Air Dry Cream! I loved that I could use it on dry or damp hair. It never left my hair feeling oily. It was always soft and smooth after. It did a great job knocking out any frizz while also giving my hair shape. It smells nice too and has clean ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I loved, loved, loved this product! It is a an amazing air dry cream that leaves my wavy hair feeling soft, sans any of that crunchiness or heavy weighed down feeling other creams have, and it helps to define my unruly waves. It left my hair soft, shiny, smooth (I'm also a frizz ball), and it smells beautiful. Not heavily perfumed, but a nice clean scent that smells so good. It's currently monsoon season where I live, so it's been extremely humid, and this product still helped keep my frizziness at bay, while leaving my hair feeling lightweight. I also love that this is a clean hair product that also protects from UV damage. I live in an extremely sunny climate when it isn't monsoon season, and any added UV protection is important. The ingredients include hemi-squalane, moringa seed oil, chia seed extract, which all help to smooth, soften, and add shine to your hair, and they work! I've been trying to use less chemicals when it comes to my hair care, so I was happy to have found a new air dry cream that does what it claims to do. I also like that the packaging is recyclable. I highly recommend this product, especially since I feel it's quite reasonably priced, has some great clean ingredients, and helps keep my poof ball hair, smooth, shiny and defined without weighing it down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this cream free from JVN and Influenster free to review. The scent is really nice just like the serum. It made my hair feel soft but letting it air dry was a little disappointing. It wasn't as smooth as the serum made it and it was a little thick. I may have just used too much though. I'm still going to use though bc when using it before blowing my hair out, made my hair really smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes queennnm! Loving this air dry creme for my long fine thin hair! I always air dry my hair anyway and this totally helps with the frizz and give my hair a bit of structure to help keep it looking beautiful  I highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cream! I used it both in my damp hair and dry hair and saw a big difference in the shine and softness of my hair! My favorite thing is it didn't leave an oily feeling in my hair it just smoothed it out .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I love that it is a clean product. It made my hair feel amazing, even in a heat wave. I would definitely purchase this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works great together with the JVN Recovery Serum. I have alopecia so I totally rely on wigs to provide hair styles. Currently I am using a pastel purple color treated human-hair wig so relying on hair products can be confusing. A lot of the time when I wash it, after leaving it to air dry the amount of frizz is extremely out of control. This helps to tame that, preventing much of the poof I end up with. I tried this after air drying and again using a blow dryer on medium heat. This helps to prevent heat damage which is what I think helped so much with the frizz or split ends. I really was happy with this also because it is color-safe and vegan. Both products are so easy to use and don't feel greasy or heavy and both smell amazing! I like how this is not messy, feels lightweight and easy to just rub through the hair strands. This has the hemisqualane ingredient in it which is supposed to play a big factor in frizz, smoothing and recovery or breakage. This had my wig smelling so good and feeling so soft. The packaging is a squeezable tube that's easy to get out with a top. I really like that this is recyclable also!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products for free from Influenster and JVN in exchange for my honest review. My hair is naturally straight, so I was excited when I used the JVN Complete Air Dry Cream, scrunched my damp hair, allowed it to air dry, and had beautiful waves afterwards! My hair felt so soft, and not sticky or crunchy. In fact, it felt like I had no product in my hair at all! A little goes a long way when using JVN, and I appreciate that this product is not heavy, and does not weigh down my fine hair. JVN hair products are vegan and cruelty-free, and color-safe. Since using the Air Dry Cream, I no longer worry that my hair will look frayed or frizzy after air drying. Such a nice relief! I love applying after getting out of the pool and rinsing my hair. This product is a game changer!

So this is perfect for twist outs or making coils with kinky hair because its lightweight and hold curls instead of putting so much eco styling gel in your hair. Like... i get it now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I love this product. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really thought I was going to like this. I'm 39 and after having two children the texture of my hair has changed considerably.  It's more wavy, more fine, but there's a lot of it.  My goal was to find a product to help enhance the waves without making my hair looked weighed down.  I'm a sucker for new products so I gave JVN a shot.  I tried the air dry cream alone and I tried it with the leave in serum...talk about weighed down.  And yes, I avoided the scalp area.  My hair ultimately felt dry, heavy, and just dirty in general.  Right in the trash it went, along with his other products.  No incentive here, bought with my own money, and I dislike it immensely.  Still on the look out for the best product, until then cheaper drugstore options are the best for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product! When my hair drys naturally I don't have frizz and my hair has new life. It looks like a cake back feom the salon every time. I love that I don't need to blow dry with this, especially during the summer months, I can put this in and Go! Highly recommend

If I had time to style or curl my hair then this would be perfect, but most of the time I just wear my hair down or up in a high ponytail or messy bun. reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Influencester for my honest review,  I was quite impressed with this hair cream. I used it after washing my hair, it applied easily, very thick and creamy and made my hair feel silky soft. Would definitely repurchase in the future

reviews.review_title: Took a bit to figure it out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try the new products from JVN. I air dry my hair about 90% of the time, and thought this would be a great addition to my routine. It took me several tries to figure out how to get it to work best. It works almost as a curl cream. My hair is slightly wavy and relatively thick and frizzy. I found this applies best on damp, but not wet hair, and almost scrunched in. It didn't make my hair feel crunchy or greasy, but also didn't give as much shine or hold as I was hoping either. I layered it with my detangler and shine oil and it didn't weigh my hair down any more than normal! It doesn't have an overpowering smell to me and the tube is massive for the price. Definitely a good steal, might just have to play around with it more to find what works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair cream is amazing! I have fine wavy hair that gets very frizzy when it's humid. When I air dry with this cream on, my hair is soft, shiny, smells heavenly and is a lot less frizzy! If you have fine hair you should give this a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am completely obsessed with this air dry cream. During the summer I try to air dry my hair every time I wash it. This cream helps provide shine and helps my hair texture. It also reduces the amount of frizz in my hair. This has become a staple in my hair routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product in exchange for my honest review. This product is great. It has an amazing scent. The item is easy to apply to the hair. It made my hair feel soft and manageable. The item is lightweight and is very easy to use. I definitely will recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: summer savior for fine curly hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine curly hair and this has been a summer savior this summer. I don't like to blow dry my hair much in the summer as it's a futile effort with heat and humidity. This made my curls more defined with minimal effort. It's lightweight and smells amazing. I would absolutely purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this for my fine curly hair! My hair is prone to fizziness so I really liked this product for helping with that. It also creates a good u201ccastu201d on my curls (for those familiar with the curly girl method) so it works well as a daily styling cream. I love the scent as well. It reminds me of candy in a way, very pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate blowdrying my hair more than i hate wearing a wet tshirt. I love this formula! As someone with thick straight mexican hair living in the armpit of TX, my hair airdried without any frizz! It smells nice, as in almost no scent. It doesn't feel heavy or sticky. I highly recommend to anyone who likes a more natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick, wavy/curly hair and blow drying gets tiresome and damages my hair after a while. Thought I'd try this cream to tame the air dry game and control frizz during these hot humid months. I've used it once and the film it left on my hair is disgusting. I went to brush my hair today and the buildup from one use was visible in the bristles. Perhaps I used too much (nickel sized or less in my palm) or maybe you're not supposed to brush your hair? Either way- no thanks. I've never returned an item after opening but this may have to be the exception. I'll try something else with that $25.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty great product. Easy to open and use. And I love the simple packaging. Doesn't leave my greasy. My hair looks and feels good after using this.

reviews.review_title: Complete Air Dry for the win!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ** Incentivized ** I received this full size product of Complete Air Dry Cream from JVN and Influenster for free in exchange for an honest review. For me personally, JVN's scent reminds me of Clean Linen with hints of Gardenias, Verbena and Creamy Peach.  It feels silky smooth with a matte texture however it's not dry it's actually hydrating , with a fine glossy feel.  The JVN website says it's SCENT is Sparkling Grapefruit and Tangerine infused with White Florals, Soft Violet and Sweet Honey notes.    You're probably asking yourself, u201cwhy is this person spending so much time explaining the scent?u201d Reason being, so often people while using hair products associate smell with the quality of the product. However any person educated in cosmetology knows the two are not related.  I've had the pleasure of using this product on a few different clients with different strand densities and textures.  Each time they have commented how glossy they felt their hair appeared and the appearance of shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my hair smooth and soft! The smell is lovely and a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_title: Perfect for style and hold without much effort
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the texture of this creme! I have really thin, fine hair and some cremes tend to weigh down my hair. This one was the perfect amount of richness. It's perfect to use after you've towel dried your hair to give it some moisture, shine, and texture. I also like to use it before styling because it has a nice flexible hold to the formula. It also doesn't flake, which was important to me.  It's also huge so you get a ton of the product and it's reasonably priced and sustainable, which usually is hard to find. The packaging is in this metal tube, which makes it easy to squeeze out. It's not very travel friendly because it's a bit heavy, but it's perfect for your counter because of the minimalistic design. The only thing I wish it had was a way for it to stand up on its own, if it had a wider cap to use as a base.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just like the heat protectant serum this smells great.  I use this product everytime I wash my hair.  Leaves it feeling soft and silky like I just came from the salon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion. I did not like the scent of this product so I didn't use often enough to see any changes in my hair. It did seem to soften and tame my frizz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For my always silky hair it works for volume and hairstyling better than others. Mostly I air dry my hair and it make beach waves with this JVN cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: About a month ago, JVN Hair and Influenster  gifted me 2 products: the Complete Air Dry Cream & Instant Recovery Serum. I struggle to find products that smooth my frizz so my curls can pop, without weighing down my hair - I can't stand the feeling of anything sticky or hard, because I like to be able to touch my hair & restyle it without it becoming a sticky mess.   These are AMAZING. Like, jaw-dropping, kiss the tube, talk-into-the-mirror amazing!! So lightweight, so smoothing, & basically invisible in the hair. AND, my wash days last longer because they leave no residue, are easy to restyle with just water, & keep frizz down for days! The secret is Hemisqualane, a non-silicone smoother & hydrator. And the smell is DIVINE!!  The Air Dry cream is fantastic on its own & has become my go-to one-&-done styler. The Serum is even more hydrating, for an extra layer of smoothing & heat protection - I layer it under the Air Dry Cream if I'm planning to diffuse. For even more definition & hold, you can add a light gel over top but it's not necessary. My curls stay for days, refresh with just water, & look wayyyyy better than with anything else I've tried. They're even better with the shampoo, conditioner, & conditioning mist (purchased myself).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I air dry my hair fairly often and have noticed a lot of frizz and split ends since I've started regularly changing my hair color up. While this Air Dry Cream smells incredible and left my hair insanely soft, I didn't notice any real difference in the frizz department, which was a little disappointing. I will definitely keep using this product for the scent and softness alone, but I don't think I would purchase it, and I couldn't honestly recommend it to someone wanting a smoothing air dry cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this but it doesn't work fires my hair. There idea is great and it has some of the same ingredients of my favorite hair product. This formulation however doesn't work for me. My hair is curly and wavy and responds really well to oils.

reviews.review_title: Found waves I didn't know I had!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have naturally very straight hair, and I purchased this product because I prefer to let it air dry, but I don't like how it lays and gets fluffy when it does. Initially I wasn't wow'd by the results - it actually seemed fluffier than usual. Then, I noticed waves. A whole slew of waves had formed on the back of my head. I've never had waves unintentionally before. So the next wash I went in with intention: I used more product, I scrunched the heck out of my hair, and I waited. Thoroughly impressed by the results. My hair looks like I spent a lot of time trying to make beachy waves. I sat on my butt and ate chips. Incredible. This is definitely a product I'm going to keep working with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: JVN is helping me find my wavy hair! Thanks to this and TikTok, I've realized I actually have wavy hair. JVN just posted a video showing how to combine this with the serum and I've been trying that with good success! Cute waves with minimal effort!

reviews.review_title: Hair so fabulous in no time at all
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is so much to love about this air dry hair cream. When all you have time for is a quick shower this stuff goes a long way. I like running a bit through my hair after a quick towel dry. If you have naturally wavy hair it will enhance that. It will give you those soft beach waves without the nasty gel crunch. It also doesn't leave any bad sticky residue in your hair or hands. I will continue using this cream for a beautifully natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

Granted, I have short hair, but it's still thick and takes awhile to blow-dry, but not after applying this stuff!!  I use a diffuser and my hair is completely dry without frizz in 5 minutes.   It's light, non-greasy, and smells AMAZING!!!  I'd absolutely recommend it.

I am glad I had the privilege to try it, but will not purchase it in the future.  #jvnhair #jvngifted #complimentary @jvnhair @influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my hair very smooth and shiny. Eliminates frizz and not sticky. I really like it and would totally recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: #jvnhair #JVNGifted #complimentary @jvnhair @Influenster #incentivized   I received this product free from Influenster as an incentive to give my honest review. The complete air dry cream works wonders! I don't typically use heat in my hair so finding a product that cuts down my frizz as well as adds texture to hold my natural waves is usually a task. The first time I used it I definitely used too much and that was using about a quarter sized portion. It left my hair so rough feeling and weighed it down a ton! The second time though I cut it down to about a dime size and praying hands distributed it through my hair, finger combed, and wide tooth combed and let it air dry. It was tons better! I'm a sahm and thanks to this product  being able to have a hairstyle other than messy bun that looks fine to go out in public with is great!

reviews.review_title: LOVE this product for my curls
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine (the strands), thick (the amount) 3a/b curls that err on the side of dry. I have struggled with finding great products for my hair for years - my curly girls know the struggle. I have dialed in a great routine to maximize my curls, and I was hesitant to try a new product. But man - this JVN product delivered. My curls are incredibly soft and touchable (but ya gotta ask first!), and the shine is out of this world. I wash every 3-5 days and do a wet/spray refresh as needed. The Air Dry Cream was easily re-activated with a spray refresh. My curls re-clumped and had tons of volume. I did my hair with the 2 JVN products I was sent, and both my husband and one of my best friends remarked at how amazing my hair looked without me telling them I did anything different. This product is definitely one I'll keep in my vanity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am writing this same review for the Air Dry cream, the undamaged shampoo, and the nurture hydration conditioner. Today was my first time using these 3 products and I already love them. First the shampoo, the consistency was a tad runny but had a nice slippery feel to it. I like the scent ( smells like natural essential oils ) and I like how much it lathers and spreads you only need one pump. Secondly the conditioner, it smelled a little weird (like old lady perfume in an essential oil way, wasn't too bad tho). The consistency was a good medium not too thin nor thick, it didn't weigh down my fine curly hair at all and felt like a good hydrating conditioner as I rinsed it out. When you are about to use the shampoo and conditioner bottles for the first time some reviews said the pumps didn't work or are hard to get started but the trick to it is to hold the smaller ring on the pump in place while you are turning the handle and it'll pop up no problem. The Air Dry cream had very light hold and helped my curls form beautifully and it had a fine smell to it. My curls felt soft after they dried completely. The samples that come from the JVN website are SUPER small so don't get excited just buy the full size air dry cream if you want to try it, the full size of the moisture mask is bigger than I expected and I'm excited to try it at the end of this week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster and JVN for my honest review. I find I reach for this product when I want naked curls. This is not a go-to product for me on washdays that I am doing a full style. But that being said there is a place in my hair routine for this product. The packaging feels luxurious, the product smells expensive but the scent doesn't linger, and the formula is light weight and leaves my hair frizz free and hydrated. It doesn't leave a residue or producty feeling in my hair. I would recommend this for someone with medium density/porosity but I don't know if it would be enough hydration for someone with thicker, denser, or more curly/coily hair.

reviews.review_title: Not as well as I would like
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This air dry cream is meant to be worked through wet, dap, or dry hair to add texture and shine. The product is meant to be workable and buildable in a formulation that still mostly retains natural hair texture when dried.  While I love the JVN cashmere and amber scent with citrus notes, I don't think this cream offered enough texture and hold control compared to other hair texturing and styling products in this same category. While it does manage to add a slight texture and shine, it really falls short regarding holding or styling, especially on shorter styles that need a lot more hold control to keep hair in place. It's such a shame, as this product is gender neutral and would otherwise work well for both men and women.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary JVN Complete Air Dry Cream for review. I am Filipina with medium length wavy, coarse, frizzy hair who lives in the Southern California desert. As a nurse of nearly 25 years, I'm used to washing my hair at night and putting it in a bun to get it out of the way on any given day. I was hoping this would help with the frizziness and keep my hair smooth. It sure did! It had a very light refreshing scent which didn't trigger my migraines-always a plus! I didn't know how much to use and maybe ended up with about a quarter to half dollar amount to get most of my hair minus my scalp. My hair really took to this cream and it helped accentuate the curly without being crunchy. It's slightly stiffer than my normal hair but feels natural when I run my fingers through my hair and not like it was full of product. The only thing I wish would be changed is to have it in a pump form rather than having to squeeze it out of a tube. I can see the product not being able to be stored vertically once I am running low on product. Other than that, I love this product and saved the name to purchase after I am done with this tube. I totally recommend it for anyone who wants a light feeling but effective air dry hair cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have wavy hair, and this product really helped cut down on my normal air dry routine. I love how it helped my hair hold it's shape, without making it crunchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you @jvnhair for sending me this awesome box of hair products for my review!!  This was an amazing collection of products for someone who often has no frills hair and often does a natural dry technique. Your non gender specific hair good work for everyone in the family. My son was even able to use the products and guys hair care selection is lacking at best at stores. The scent is amazing and not overly perfumed providing a clean hair smell.    The air dry cream was applied to wet hair and didn't take much, it applied a soft yet textured feel on the morning with all day frizz relief.    The instant recovery serum used somewhat similar, small amount on wet hair but I diffused my hair (ponytail shot). It left my hair shiny and soft all day long, only downfall was it did not hold up well to humidity so a mixture of the two is the perfect combo.  Both containers are a large size and will last a long time !! Woohoo for good natural hair days without heat damage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_text: The older I get. The less manageable my hair has become. Especially after having a baby, so much of my hair has broken and is now starting to regrow giving me this funky frizz. JVN air styling cream is amazing. First, it has such a fresh clean scent so I don't mind using it in my hair. I actually enjoy the sweet fruity smell. On top of that, I love that the product not only helps to control and reduce frizz. I can use it to style as well. This way I don't need multiple products in my hair weighing it down. It also gives a smoothing effect to my hair. I have body waves and it doesn't make them automatically straight or turn them into a frizzy curl. It gives body to my hair while styling it in a way that would normally take me at least two products and a lot of time. I blow dry my hair and air dry my hair but I'd say I leave it to air dry 65% of the time so this is a product I can use almost every time I wash my hair. I enjoyed using the product and I like it more each time I use it.

reviews.review_text: I love the JVC Complete Hydrateing Air Dry Cream. It helps my hair air dry quicker. It helps keep my hair soft and it helps the frizz.

reviews.review_text: My first impression of this cream was that the smell was a little strong for me and the fragrance not very appealing. Thankfully it doesn't last long, because I do love the way this helps my fine hair dry without frizz. It seems too add some shine, smooths strands, and overall helps give my hair a more polished look. I usually do air dry my hair, so I'm always looking for products to help. Lately I've been putting hyaluronic acid into my wet hair as a first step, then a cream product once it has dried just a bit. The combination has been helping my hair have more hydration and healthy shine! The JVN cream has also been working well to hold in smooth waves. When I have the time, I will wait for my hair to be just damp, and then apply cream and twist it into little buns with alligator clips. After 30-60 minutes I take the clips out and gently run a wide-toothed comb through my hair. The JVN cream helps reduce frizz when I comb out, without weighing down the waves!

reviews.review_title: It's coming on vacation with me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product Complimentary from Influenster to sample and give my honest review.  I found a favorite hair car product with JVN Complete Hydrating Air Dry Hair Cream.  It's easy to use, you take a very small amount. Maybe dime size and pass it through your damp hair. Comb through and let air dry.   If I have time in the day, I make two pig tails, no bands, just coil them tight with my finger and clip. Then just let dry.  It leaves such nice waves to my hair.  If there's not much time, I just let the hair down and air dry.  I've also used my curling iron brush and hair sets so beautifully.  No crunchy hair, just soft manageable hair without the frizz or dryer up look.  Leaves hair looking healthy.  It has a soft unisex scent.  It won't clash with any perfumes you're wearing.  I'm sad that this product didn't come out decades ago.  I love it so much, it's the only hair product I'm taking on vacation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 3 stars because I believe there is room for improvement for this product. I did notice an improvement with my hair using this air dry cream; my waves actually held. However, the cream left my hair looking dull and didn't take away the frizz. The feel of my hair was also off-putting. Although it did not make my hair feel crunchy it did make it feel dirty.

reviews.review_title: Great product but maybe not for thick hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: JVN'S complete hydrating air dry cream has such a great scent especially when paired with the serum. It's very clean and fresh and makes your hair smell so good. I have very thick hair wavy to curly hair and air drying is just a pain. It takes hours. But I gave it a shot with this. I think with hair less prone to frizz or in an environment that isn't as humid as where I live, it would be a phenomenal product that would help hold waves and curls but for me I still find myself having to hear style. Even then it does make my hair feel and look more hydrated, so it's still a win just not exactly what I was hoping for. Still recommend giving it a shot though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: got this JVN complete hydrating air dry cream for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review and I have to say, I really like it a lot! It smells GREAT & actually works! Normally I don't like my hair if it dries naturally but this stuff really made a difference. Super excited to continue using it this summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this JVN complete hydrating air dry cream for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review and I have to say, I really like it a lot! It smells really nice and leaves my hair feeling refreshed and smooth all day! Thank you Influenster for my free sample! It is awesome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have very thick, wavy hair that I recently stopped using heat to style. I was so excited to try this air dry cream but unfortunately it just doesn't do anything for my hair. I didn't have high hopes because my hair is incredibly difficult to find products that work on it but I was expecting it to at least do something. If anything, my hair looks better when I use nothing at all compared to using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm shocked at how well this worked. I've tried so many before and my hair looks a hot mess. But this fantastic smelling cream did wonders! My hair looks wavy and fun without any effort. Holy grail type stuff here

reviews.review_title: Smells great and works with airwrap
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! I recently bought a dyson airwrap and this is the only product that I've used that works well with it and I've tried brands like olaplwx, keratese etc. i received it as part of a voxbox but would purchase again once I run out. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. I have dry, frizzy, coarse hair. I blow dry and then straighten my hair. I saw an add for this and thought let's try it. Well was I amazed!  It controls the frizz, keeps my hair straight and my hair even looks healthy!  I even got caught in the rain and still no frizz. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion.  JVN air dry is the product for my wavy/curly hair. I just apply a little throughout my hair and it drys so beautifully!  Plus it leaves my hair so soft and shiny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair
reviews.review_text: Horrible smell.  Like others have noted, it literally smells like the 90s stick air fresheners that your grandma had in her bathroom. Besides the smell hold is subpar, doesn't really do much for my naturally wavy hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm impressed so far. Definitely feel like it made a difference with my curls holding after air drying. And I think it added a nice shine. I'm in love with the scent of the product too. Only taking a point away because I'm not a huge fan of the packaging. The wrinkly metal tube can be aesthetic but it's kind of a pain to store. Overall impressed so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does the job and pretty well at that. It doesn't have a strong smell to it which I like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, this product did not work for me. I have curly hair with light blonde highlights (with a little damage). This hair cream made my hair even more frizzy. It left a crusty residue and it wasn't soft. It was also NOT hydrating, it left my hair feeling more dry than before i applied it. And, it did not enhance or shape into the texture of my curls. I wanted to give this product a chance but it don't like how my hair feels after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not the greatest for 4c hair. Didnt help much with my hair frizz or curl control. Not suitable for a wash & go. However, will a different way to incorporate it into my routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster at no cost. I really love this product is what I have natural Curly hair and it helped my curls dry within half at a time that it usually takes which is about 2 1/2 to 3 hours. My hair was dry in an hour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The air dry cream is like a dream. It helps my wavy hair to air dry and quicker that other products I have used. The product is easy to apply. Distributes evenly throughout the hair and smells great. My hair doesn't need as long to air dry now. Would purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. Omg this is amazing! It feels great in my hair whether I use it on damp or dry hair. It takes my wild frizzy hair, and doesn't make my hair sticky which is so important to me. Plus, the smell is absolutely amazing!! I also love that they include a pamphlet that has directions in so many different languages. An all inclusive world wide wonderful product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells incredible. Does not weigh down my thin hair at all but makes it soft and bouncy while defining my natural waves

reviews.review_title: i wanted to love this one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: so i want to start with saying i love jonathan and everything he stands for. i wanted to love this line so much, but in the end it didn't work for me  i used this product for more than 3 months. this was by far the most disappointing one i used in the line, especially where it's the one that drew me to this line. i really wanted to love it and make it work, but it never did. i always had to use more product than i wanted to and it really dried out my hair  i will not be continuing with this line. i'd only come back if some serious changes were made because this is not the only product i have had issues with
